story:
The Impact

Why are we doing this?

In this case it is simple. To accelerate South Africa's transition to sustainable energy. By doing this we will decrease South Africa's carbon footprint and increase employment. More on this below. 

In South Africa there is only one energy utility named Eskom, which has a monopoly on the generation, transmission and sale of electricity in the country. According to US AID (https://www.usaid.gov/powerafrica/south-africa), 91% of energy generated by Eskom is from coal and according to Wikipedia Eskom alone emits 42% of South Africa's total greenhouse gasses!

The cost of pollution

In a Bloomberg article posted on 27 June 2019 they state: "Eskom, which owns 12 coal-fired power plants in Mpumalanga province, in which the small village of Pullens Hope lies. The power plants are in a belt of 90 miles by 110 miles that accounts for most of South Africa’s electricity production. Air pollution in the biggest towns in Mpumalanga is regularly higher than that in Beijing and Jakarta, two of the most polluted cities in the world, according to AirVisual, an air-quality monitoring app." It goes on to say: "Pullens Hope has doomed Rita Phoku’s family, she says. For decades, she lived between a storage site for Eskom’s burnt-coal waste and a coal-mine complex. Four of her five children suffer from asthma and other respiratory illnesses, while her 23-year-old daughter, Prudence, died of cancer of the lungs and respiratory tract. Her sister, who lived nearby, suffered repeated miscarriages and died of respiratory illness. All told, Phoku says, she has lost as many as nine family members to respiratory-related diseases."

Rita Phoku

The impact on unemployment

Since 2014 Eskom has not been able to generate enough electricity for the countries needs and SA has experienced what is known as "Load Shedding". Definition = "action to reduce the load on something, especially the interruption of an electricity supply to avoid excessive load on the generating plant". Basically they shut the power off for hours in certain areas to decrease the amount being used by the country in order to match it to the amount which they are able to produce at the time!

Renewable energy - especially solar and wind create more jobs than coal as per this Forbes article from 2019: "Renewable Energy Job Boom Creates Economic Opportunity As Coal Industry Slumps"

Forbes on employment

Forbes on fastest growing jobs

 

Fast Forward to 2020 and the private sector in SA is not allowed to produce and sell large enough quantities of electricity, which would make building large scale sustainable/renewable energy projects feasible and create large amounts of employment opportunities. 

So to summarize the WHY - Raise public awareness about the benefits of sustainable energy not only on the environment, but also on unemployment. Whilst raising awareness ask the public to sign our petition to lawmakers to fast track sustainable energy policies.

This is where you come in. 

 

What are we doing?

Raising the awareness of the public to the fact that South Africa has been slow on updating regulations to move South Africa's energy consumption to more sustainable energy sources. We will do this by providing information and facts to the public on the current situation on energy in the country and the benefits of sustainable energy for the environment and employment. They will sign a petition asking for the acceleration of policies and regulations on sustainable energy production. Link here: http://chng.it/MwmNX4ksXs. Now you may wonder, how are we going to get the public together in large numbers and interested in sustainable energy?

 

How are we doing it?

We thought long and hard about how to get people together and excited about sustainable and renewable energy. We needed something which would stand out, catch the eye and prick people's interest to come and engage with us. We will interact with them and share our passion for sustainable energy and the mission of accelerating South Africa's transition to sustainable energy.

It was decided that an out of the ordinary electric vehicle - the Tesla Model X - would be the perfect show stopper and attract a crowd. It catches the eye and has many features that normal vehicles do not have which people can play with and experience - thus getting them to engage with us and excited about the current electric technology out there in the world. It will also show people that going electric and renewable is "cool" and that the technology has advanced tremendously. Additionally when doing some research it appears that this will be the first ever Tesla vehicle in South Africa, which we will use as another way to garner people and the media's attention.

The plan then is simple. Import the Tesla Model X into South Africa and showcase it everywhere and anywhere with as much media attention as possible to spread the word. We will showcase it in all of the shopping centers across the country (South Africans love shopping centers), at the race tracks, at historical places, monuments, Table Mountain and perhaps even the Kruger National Park. Personally, we think a Tesla parked next to a lion in the Kruger could generate world wide media attention. 

We will allow people to experience the vehicle and all of its features (for example: smart summon, playing racing games with the steering wheel and pedals, playing with the console and seeing the car dance), we will take people for drives in the vehicle and we will let some drive the vehicle themselves! We will be filming every test drive and every Ludicrous mode launch to see the reactions and faces of the unsuspecting members of the public! We will drive it across the country, filming people's reactions and us engaging with the public on the mission of accelerating sustainable energy in South Africa. Basically everywhere the vehicle goes it will draw a crowd and we will share the mission with them, sign the petition and record footage of the entire journey. History in the making.

 

Final Deliverables - How will we measure success

  1. Successfully imported the first Tesla to South Africa
  2. Showcased the vehicle at the V&A Waterfront in Cape Town and obtained at least 1000 signatures
  3. Showcased the vehicle at Sandton City in Johannesburg and obtained at least 1000 signatures
  4. Showcased the vehicle at Mall of Africa in Johannesburg and obtained at least 1000 signatures
  5. Showcased the vehicle at Gateway in Durban and obtained at least 1000 signatures
  6. Showcased the vehicle at Kyalami Race Track in Johannesburg and obtained at least 1000 signatures
  7. Showcased the vehicle on national television
  8. Thousands of personal shout outs to backers/accelerators
  9. Awesome limited edition T-Shirts 
  10. Presented the petition to minister of environmental affairs.
  11. Created and shared a full video / mini series with all of you

YOUR PART OF THE MISSION

We have brainstormed creative ways for you to become part of this mission and created awesome perks of which some will last forever. Please refer to perks section of the website.

Your contribution will go directly towards accelerating South Africa's transition to sustainable energy by granting a person in South Africa the opportunity to experience the Tesla vehicle and engage with us. They will make a personalized shout out video thanking you personally for your part in the mission. One of the ultimate prizes is having your name inscribed on the Frunk (Front trunk) of the Model X forever, which will be showcased across the country during the cross country road trip. Thus "you" / your name will go everywhere with the vehicle!

We look forward to having you on the journey with us - making a positive and permanent change in the future of sustainable energy in South Africa and perhaps even the entire Africa.

"Be the change you want to see in the world" - Mahatma Gandhi 

"Don't doubt your vibe" - Elon Musk

 

ADDITIONAL DETAILS

Costs involved

The costs involved include those of purchasing the vehicle, shipping it to South Africa, insurance and any repairs and maintenance required. Legal fees for the petition and charging costs. Other costs include the creation of prizes and shipping thereof to accelerators. We will limit and potentially eliminate the costs of promotions and exhibitions in South Africa by engaging with shopping centers and race tracks, explaining the mission and getting them  to use the exhibitions to showcase their own commitment to the acceleration of sustainable and renewable energy in South Africa. Any over funding will help the team to continue raising awareness and putting pressure on government to fast track legislation. 

Timeline

30 August 2020 - Campaign completion

30 September 2020 - Vehicle prepared and ready to be shipped from UK

30 October 2020 - Vehicle arrives in South Africa

1 November 2020 - Mission Begins - shout outs are made & perks are received!

Sources

Bloomberg article - https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2019-06...

Forbes article - https://www.forbes.com/sites/energyinnovation/2...

 

Please make some noise & share the campaign using Indiegogo's share tools, with friends and family who might share your interest in our campaign.

Thank you

     

    Something else

    Electric vehicles in SA are non existent besides for a couple of BMWI8's and Jaguar I-Paces. On top of that these vehicles are expensive and thus most people in SA are not able to see or even test drive them nor are they widely promoted. Thus showcasing the Tesla Model X in shopping centers across South Africa, together with a road trip across the country should generate enough media attention and public interest - We are hoping - to open the eyes of the public which could lead to some pressure on government to decrease import duties on electric vehicles.

    From the Tesla Website - Link here: https://www.tesla.com/en_GB/about?redirect=no

    "And this is just the beginning. With Tesla building its most affordable car yet, Tesla continues to make products accessible and affordable to more and more people, ultimately accelerating the advent of clean transport and clean energy production. Electric cars, batteries, and renewable energy generation and storage already exist independently, but when combined, they become even more powerful – that’s the future we want."

     

    Short Introduction & Summary

    I am Ben Jordaan, a qualified CA(SA) - ICAEW equivalent in England and CPA equivalent in USA. I am passionate about Tesla and the future of renewable energy in the world. Actively trying to live a noble life and leave the world a better place when I'm done here. While making people smile in the process! Enjoy reading, working out, wine, cappuccinos, occasionally singing karaoke and dancing the night away. 

    I want to give you a glimpse into my thoughts on this campaign and the "why" behind it. Basically I have worked in corporate up until now, saved enough to sustain myself for a few years and have decided to do something I am passionate about and that also makes a difference in the world. I am passionate about (1) sustainable energy, (2) Tesla as an element of that and (3) doing good, whilst having a bit of fun and making people smile. Coincidentally these 3 things matched up with this idea and it has the potential to make a fundamental change in South Africa. Super Excited!

    Find me on:

    Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ben-jordaan-12a14868

    Twitter: BenJordaan2

    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ben.jordaan

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What if we can make our own prepaid meter.

We, Nigerians are all aware of the unwillingness of PHCN companies to provide perepaid meters for their customers. This obviously gives them opportunity to extort money from innocent Nigerians even while not providing the electricity service. We 've even been asked to pay for prepaid meter in their effort to extort us the more.

But what if we can provide the meter for ourselves. And even if today they refuse to use it to bill us for our electricity consumption, we at least have a yardstick by which we can compare their extorting bills with what we actually consume.

Welcome uSmartMeter. uSmartMeter is a micro smart metering device, measuring only 28mm by 28mm in dimension, less than 1/4th in area of an ATM card, costing only about #2000 to make. Equipped with wireless connectivity to the internet, your power usage is automatically recorded even when offline and logged online when internet is available or read out to your mobile phone for usage visualization and comparison against your end of the month bill.

SPECIFICATIONS

Supply Voltage: 120V - 260V

Load Current: 40A maximum

Connectivity: WIFI

Management Tool: Mobile Phone and Web

uSmartMeter is currently under production and we will be giving it away to Nigerians willing to have it. We however welcome your suggestion and support if you want to.

Please note the cost detailed her only apply for production. Shipment to backers will be catered for by the backer, and the cost will vary depending on backer location. The device will ship from Lagos, Nigeria.


uSmartMeter is a free metering initiative, It's time we stand and fight.

story:
(Click on the picture of each perk to see a description of it.)

 

Hello there, we are Bossinova Research Group.  We have over 5 years and several thousands of hours of research in just about every field good for man kind and the earth, so that we can bring them both together in harmony.

  We know the world is going through a lot right now and we would like to share some of our ideas with you in order to exchange, rather than request assistance for our jump start from the research to development stage.

  We have lots of great information to share, great ideas for the world, and techniques for doing things unlike anything done before!

  We have ideas for things such as destroying ALL viruses, killing cancer (and preventing it),

Greenhouses that can grow food in the middle of winter without outside electricity,

Super energy efficient homes that would never need a.c. and little if any heat,

New and fully "Green" methods of collecting power from the earth Passively!,

and Much Much more!

 

Please check out our website at www.BossinovaResearchGroup.com .
story_txt:
(Click on the picture of each perk to see a description of it.)
 
Hello there, we are Bossinova Research Group.  We have over 5 years and several thousands of hours of research in just about every field good for man kind and the earth, so that we can bring them both together in harmony.
  We know the world is going through a lot right now and we would like to share some of our ideas with you in order to exchange, rather than request assistance for our jump start from the research to development stage.
  We have lots of great information to share, great ideas for the world, and techniques for doing things unlike anything done before!
  We have ideas for things such as destroying ALL viruses, killing cancer (and preventing it),
Greenhouses that can grow food in the middle of winter without outside electricity,
Super energy efficient homes that would never need a.c. and little if any heat,
New and fully "Green" methods of collecting power from the earth Passively!,
and Much Much more!
 
Please check out our website at www.BossinovaResearchGroup.com .

story:
Short Summary

Honey bees are vital to life on Earth especially for humans. For years the depletion of honey bees was believed to be caused by herbicides and pesticides. Then it was determined the problem was actually caused by a Mite. "Varroa mites remain the worlds most destructive honey bee killer" according to the University of Florida. 

 Treatment for these mites is both expensive and arduous. Mite E Vape revolutionizes this treatment with the most affordable and effective solution ever invented. 

From the Hobbyist to the largest Commercial operator. 

  • Chris Wood began his passion for beekeeping as a child. His father was a hobbyist with half a dozen bee hives. Chris was fascinated when his father would tend to the bees,  but his dad kept him at a safe distance so he wouldn't get stung, which only served to further Chris's interest. 
  • As an adult, Chris began his own bee keeping operation in 2011,  even opening a store specific to selling his honey,  offering flavored honeys such as Habenero honey with candied lemon orange peels and Jalepeno Raspberry.  
  • This foray into beekeeping made the problem of the Varroa Mite front and center in the battle to save the bees. His first 4 hives seemed to be thriving then before he knew it, his bees were gone.  As a problem solver, Chris began to explore solutions to what he quickly learned was the Varroa Mite, with no acceptable solution to treat the hives. 
  • Current technologies, though effective enough to result in a recent rise in the bee population, are expensive, minimally effective and/or cumbersome and typically price the hobbyist out of the market. 
  • Your contribution stands to help put the honeybee population out of harms way and though this is a bold statement, possibly saving mankind! 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Your contribution will help  to refine the technology, making it easier to use, more effective and most importantly affordable. 
  • Whether you pre order a Mite E Vape or just contribute to the cause, you will be making a HUGE difference. 
  • Smaller donations will be rewarded with Mite E Vape Gear and Wearables, some of our World Famous Flavored Honey all the way up to Pre-ordering a Mite E Vape at a Special Discount.
  • As an Engineer, I am the soul source of income for my family.  I have a wonderful wife Robin, and three beautiful children, Eli, Ever and Edison.  At the end of every week, there is not much left over to bring the Mite E Vape to market. The funds will be used to secure our international patents, build our production quality prototype and begin production of Mite E Vape units to further our efforts to save the bees with my easy to use, affordable and effective Mite E Vape.

The Impact

Believe it or not, Varroa Mites are so destructive, one week you check hives and they are thriving, a week later, the ENTIRE COLONY is GONE! This happened to me. I wasn't worried about the Varroa Mite, that was a problem for the big Commercial guys.  I had 4 hives as a hobbyist. I had checked the hives, I did notice a strange Brood Pattern but didn't think much of it. A week later, I checked my hives again and they were empty, I'D LOST ALL MY BEES!

  • To start over was an expensive proposition. It costs over $100 for 3lbs of bees with a Queen per hive!  4 hives and I was looking at $400 and the prospect of the Mites returning!
  • There are strips and an inexpensive "Fogger" but they are minimally effective.
  • The Effective unit is THOUSANDS OF DOLLARS, cumbersome,  and not very user friendly.
  • As an Engineer, I knew there had to be an affordable way to deliver a solution. 
  • Working evenings and weekends, Chris was able to fashion a unit that worked. 
  • Lighter, easier to use, incredibly effective and only requiring power from an extension cord or a Power Inverter connected to your car, truck or buggy. 
  • Plus, SO AFFORDABLE it makes sense for even a hobbyist to own one, current treatments cost $6-10 per hive per treatment, the Mite E Vape will reduce this cost to about $.25 per hive per treatment.

Risks & Challenges

Chris has built and tested a prototype unit with incredible results, but more needs to be done!

  • With this funding, we are engaging a company that takes prototypes and will engineer a unit that looks good, is easily manufacturable and affordable .
  • Once we can go into production, spreading the word about this amazing solution will be our biggest challenge.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You can help us spread the word! We need to reach EVERY BEEKEEPER ON THE PLANET!
  • The only bees that are not affected are Africanized Honeybees, but they are DANGEROUS!
  • IndieGoGo has awesome tools for you to share this life changing technology. 
  • Gift a Mite E Vape to a beekeeper you know and love, trade them for HONEY!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
BACKGROUND

GRAMCO FUNGI have been selling Australian mushrooms since 1994. The vast majority of morel mushrooms are harvested in the Northern Hemisphere Spring. Wild morels are becoming increasingly rare in Australia as the climate changes and rain patterns shift. Australia has the ability to supply the world market with fresh cultivated Morel mushrooms in the Australian spring - September to December.

In the last 10 years Chinese growers have discovered a seasonal outdoor growing method typically yielding 1-2 tons/ hectare annually. Morel Mushrooms Australia (MMA) has access to a superior technology under licence from the Sandianshui Biology Co - China’s most successful morel growing enterprise.

USES

In Asian countries, such as China, India and Japan, the morel is used as a traditional herbal medicine. “Many reports have shown the antimicrobial, antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antitumor activities of the morel fruiting body, and some pharmacologically active ingredients have also been found” in the morel, such as polysaccharides, ergosterol derivatives, microthecin and others. The morel is valuable as functional food and natural medicine.

Furthermore, the facility required to grow morel mushrooms allows production of other mushroom varieties. These varieties can be used for medicinal products, packaging materials, building materials, and even clothing. These innovations can transform various industries replacing unhealthy production and consumption habits.

We plan to grow prototypes of mushroom leather within 12 months and to investigate mushroom varieties that eat plastic and allow bioremediation of toxic sites.

GREEN PROCESS

We are leasing approximately 60 acres on a farm in Healesville. The past history of the farm is strawberry production with the facilities being second to none. The property includes large sheds, insulated rooms and cooling rooms. The farm has a large 100 megalitre dam with reticulated water and irrigation systems across the entire property. 

Our process requires mixing and bagging our substrate into bags. The bags are sterilised, then inoculated and incubated before planting out in shade houses (outdoor production) or tubs in racks (indoor production). No chemicals are used or required. 

Correct watering procedures and environmental controls facilitate consistent morel production across the beds and in the tubs.

Products are made from agricultural waste materials blending scientific expertise with natural myceliated processes. At the end of the process we finish with compost. Making the production of mushrooms one of the world’s greenest food medicine and material science products.

This is a proven technology licensed from China's most successful morel production company. This company is collaborating with our project in Australia.

Support our initiatives to make our world cleaner, greener and healthier!

-

CITATION

Tietel, Zipora & Masaphy, Segula. (2017). True Morels (Morchella) - Nutritional and Phytochemical Composition, Health Benefits and Flavor: a Review. Critical reviews in food science and nutrition. 58. 10.1080/10408398.2017.1285269. 

https://www.researchgate.net/publication/315703...

story:
Do a lot of biking or hiking and want to make sure all your electronic devices stay charged?  You are already out in the sun with a backpack, might as well use all that free energy beaming down on your pack.  Let`s meet our new solar gadget-- SunPack, a backpack designed to keep your devices charged everywhere.  You can use SunPack to run electrical devices such as tablets , mobile phones, smart watch, GPS, and other USB gadgets.

SunPack can be for anybody, for outdoor activities or daily business use. SunPack is a backpack with added benefits: a removable solar panel which can provide power source when you need it most. It may save people's life some day when they are in the wild and lost all the power. If you have SunPack, you can charge your phone and at least to send help signal out as long as the sun is out. 

 

 Never worry about running out of phone battery when you are taking pictures for cute kitty ! :)

We are Flextech Solar Gadgets team, specialized in different types of solar applications. This is our 4th crowdfunding campaign of solar gadgets, we have successfully delivered 2206 pieces of solar products to our crowdfunding backers from 68 countries over the world. 

'' I absolutely love this portable solar charger! You kept your promise and produced a superior product...I don't know of any system currently available that even comes close to this solar charger. Thank you for keeping your promise to me and all the other people who took a risk and pledges your product. I wish you all the best success for this and all the other products you create. Thank you so much, I KNOW that one day, you will receive a post where this saved the life of someone stranded somewhere. YOU GUYS ROCK!!!!'' --- Review from previous campaign.

 

  • Advanced solar technology with ETFE film coating+ integrated laminating +  dimple surface

1) Dimple surface does not reflect the light , captures more sunlight and increases 5% solar absorption rate. It offers excellent efficiency in terms of light to electricity conversion.

2) Non-adhesive surface properties. The dirt, dust and many other pollutants are less likely to contaminate the surface of panels. When this kind of contamination occurs, a damp cloth will typically remove these particles to avoid blocking sunlight from reaching the solar panel.  Also it`s stain-resistant .

3) ETFE film coating on the solar panel. A key benefit of ETFE (Ethylene Tetrafluoroethylene) coated solar panels is that they are super durable & lightweight. And the ETFE coating provides a thin 2mm layer of protection and UV resistant. It`s durable with long lifespan .

  • Devices that can be charged by SunPack
 

​

  • Solar charging function test
  • Features integrated 3500mAh battery in the backside of 5.3W solar panel .

Why is an integrated battery necessary for the backpack solar charger?

Based on the past test experience and clients` feedbacks, the solar charging performance will be influenced by the angle of the solar panel. When on the move , the angle is always changing, so we design charging the battery and using the battery as a buffer between the solar panel and the smart phones.

 

Mobile games draining your battery? Or need to make that important call and your mobile phone is almost dead? Fear not: SunPack’s external USB port is all you need. It`s external USB charger port with built-in charging cable offers a more convenient and easier way to charge your phone, tablet and other electronic devices.

With SunPack on your back, you will never again have to worry about driving a bike or ridding a cycle during night. Reflective panels make you an easy target to spot from a distance.

 The SunPack RFID-shielded pocket will keep your personal data safe and secure. RFID Technique: Radio Frequency Identification technology, through radio signals to identify specific targets and to read and copy electronic data. Most Credit Cards, Debit Cards, ID Cards are set-in the RFID chip, the RFID reader can easily read the cards information within 10 feet (about 3m) without touching them. This pocket of SunPack is designed to protect your cards information from stealing with blocking material of RFID shielding technology.

More compartments, more storage, better organization -- you can have it all. The SunPack solar backpack has compartments for all your office essentials from stationery pens, notebooks and external hard drives, to documents, your passport, keys, USB drives, cables and laptop chargers.

Equipping with password lock to help prevent theft and keep your wallet and other items inside secure while travelling. For example, there is no need to worry about the zipper pockets are opened when you line up. At the same time, never worry about that the fixed lock will be lost, it's convenient and safe for you. 

1. PLUG 6.1W solar panel -- For solar charger starters to try , DIY solar gadgets, emergency preparation.

2. Powerleaf+14w solar charger --For solar charger professionals,  good feedback of performance and quality

For details: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/powerleaf-plus-solar-charger-perfect-for-outdoors-iphone/x/12777016#/

 

Risks and challenges
This is our 4th crowdfunding campaign of solar gadget, through previous campaigns, we understand that backers bear risk with us and make a pledge, we know how hard to successfully handle with every part- including product design, manufacture , package, delivery, service.....even every piece of material we choose... Now SunPack product design is in the final stage, our current prototype is with function, but we need to make new molds and final moldfication, such as imporove the material quality of the stand and do more tests of the charging indicator, also bring SunPack to massive production. 
Some ricks and challenges are:

1. Shipping date: We have built in extra time for the manufacturing process and are confident we will ship by the projected dates, but there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned. 
2. Product changes: Slight changes may be made based on more product testing and kickstarter community feedback. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience. 
3. Small components unexpected shortage can happen. In that case, we will inform you and do our best to solve the problem.

Please also feel free to let us know your concerns, we look forward to hearing from the Indiegogo community.Thank you for your support!

story:
STORY

                     

The brick-and-mortar shopping habits have slowly transformed into online shopping. The eCommerce retailers have brought the need for packaging to a whole new level.

We would like to introduce you to the Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer.

 

 

This mailer is made from natural resins derived from plant and corn starch. The mailer turns into non-toxic fertilizers when being placed in compost. The fertilizers can then be applied to soil to supply nutrients essential to plant growth. This process achieves the circular economy and diverts waste from the landfills and oceans.

 

THE PROBLEM

Annual eCommerce sales are set to hit $4.5 trillion by 2021, a 246% increase since 2014. As the online sales have skyrocketed, the process involves higher transportation of goods to customers and hence more packaging products will be required during the process.

The conventional petroleum-based plastic mailers are generally not accepted by the kerbside recycling program as the thin plastic films can easily wrap around the conveyor belt of plastic recycling machine and shut down the whole system.

Therefore, most of the plastic mailers end up in the landfills. Due to careless and improper waste disposal, some plastics end up in our waterways and eventually polluting the ocean.

We are drowning in a sea of packaging waste and too much of it is ending up in the ocean.

165 million tons of plastics have trashed our oceans with almost 9 million more tons of plastic waste are entering the oceans each year.

Marine mammals ingest, and get tangled up in, plastic. A large amount of plastic debris has been found in the habitat of critically endangered Hawaiian monk seals, including the areas that serve as the pup nurseries. The entanglement of sea animals in plastic debris has also led to injury and mortality. Dead whales with bellies full of plastic waste have been found all over the world.

THE SOLUTION

Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer is the sustainable packaging solution! Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer is a biodegradable and compostable mailer that diverts your online shopping packaging from the landfill.

This zero waste mailer is certified home compostable and will break down into non-toxic fertilisers within 45 days in an ideal composting environment.

Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer is made from natural resins derived from plant and corn starch.

The mailer is mainly black colour so that the film is opaque and the item stored within is not visible.

The mailer exhibits similar characteristics to the conventional petroleum-based plastic mailer i.e. waterproof

 

- durable

It looks and feels just like plastics.

A comparison between the Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer and the conventional petroleum-based plastic mailer: 


CERTIFICATIONS

Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer is certified to comply the following standards:

  • EN13432 European standard for compostable packaging
  • AS5810 Australian standard for home composting
  • AS4736 Australian standard for industrial composting

AVAILABLE SIZES

 No.

 Size

 Dimension   (mm)

 Recommended   Weight

 1

 Small

 220 x 340  (8.6" x 13.4")

 500g

 2

 Medium

 270 x 390 (10.6" x 15.3")

 2kg

 3

 Large

 395 x 455 (15.5" x 17.9")

 3kg

MAILERS THAT CLEAN THE OCEAN

Did you see the whale logo at the back of the mailer?

We know that the plastic pollution is a massive global problem but rather than feeling helpless and hoping someone else can resolve this, we want to help resolving the plastic pollution problem.

50% of our profit goes to ocean cleaning initiatives, let us do your part for you. Together we can make difference! To find out who we donate to, please check out our website at www.ecoconduct.com

 

 

WHERE’S THE INDIEGOGO MONEY GOING?

We will use the Indiegogo funds to fund our first bulk production run for all the small, medium and large sizes of Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer.

We have created the prototype of the large mailer and done a few trials on the prototype to verify its capability and durability. We have also developed the logistics and built a viable business model.

The final step is to start the first bulk production run. As the mailers are made from plant-based materials, the mailers have a shelf life of 9 to 12 months. Therefore, we would like to secure sufficient orders through Indiegogo to ensure the products get dispatched to the Backers as soon as possible! However, we are confident that we can ensure a consistent supply of mailers once the production is up and going!

 

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER INDIEGOGO?

We have worked alongside the pioneer of biobags’ producer with approximately 17 years of experience to create the prototype mailer. We have struck a deal with the producer which allows us to produce a durable, waterproof and environmentally friendly mailer at a retail price comparable to our competitors whilst cleaning up the existing plastic waste in the ocean!

We will update our Backers on the progress of production and the estimated shipping every fortnightly.

 

TIMELINE

SHIPPING

Shipping is included in the item price and we are able to ship to United States, United Kingdom, most European countries, Singapore, Canada and Australia. If you are located outside these countries and wish to purchase the mailers, please contact us beforehand.

 

BACK US ON SOCIAL MEDIA TOO

The eCommerce retailers have brought the need for packaging to a whole new level.We would like to introduce you to the Eco Conduct Zero Waste Mailer.  This mailer is made from natural resins derived from plant and corn starch. The mailer turns into non-toxic fertilizers when being placed in compost. The fertilizers can then be applied to soil to supply nutrients essential to plant growth. This process achieves the circular economy and diverts waste from the landfills and oceans. THE PROBLEMAnnual eCommerce sales are set to hit $4.5 trillion by 2021, a 246% increase since 2014. As the online sales have skyrocketed, the process involves higher transportation of goods to customers and hence more packaging products will be required during the process.The conventional petroleum-based plastic mailers are generally not accepted by the kerbside recycling program as the thin plastic films can easily wrap around the conveyor belt of plastic recycling machine and shut down the whole system.Therefore, most of the plastic mailers end up in the landfills. story:
Problem:

Roughly one-third of the food produced in the world for human consumption every year — approximately 1.3 billion tonnes — gets lost or wasted. Food losses and waste amount to roughly US$ 680 billion in industrialized countries and US$ 310 billion in developing countries. Also 815 million people of the 7.6 billion people in the world, or one in ten, were suffering from chronic undernourishment in 2016.

In addition to the wastage and hunger; an estimated 600 million – almost 1 in 10 people in the world – fall ill after eating contaminated food and 420 000 die every year, resulting in the loss of 33 million healthy life years. On the other hand every year more than 30k farmers commit suicide in India alone (and these are official numbers). 

Food is among the most crucial and biggest problem that the world and humanity are facing today. Developing countries like India and most parts of Africa are the worst hit due to this. Farmers in these countries commit suicide in the number of thousands every year.

No transparency, No traceability & reliability, lack of storage - cold infrastructure, multiple layers in the supply chain (broken), lack of knowledge with the farmers, small land holdings (less than 2 hectares on an average), eroding soil are among some of the reasons we have the above-mentioned conditions.

Himikara: 

Himikara, is developing a blockchain based platform for modeling business processes, tracing assets and building the supply chains in Agri-Tech to help off-takers of Fruits & Vegetables who are seeking transparency, traceability & reliability, procure sorted, graded & fresh quality produce  providing them full information by modernizing and transforming the supply chain storing the data in a decentralized ledger.

The platform helps farmers & producer organization who are seeking increased revenue and decreased food wastage, do a progressive farming availing suite of services like smart contracts, credits, predictive analysis, drone technologies, cold infrastructure and contract based farming.

Himi Token will be used to digitalize the value of the crop which will track the performance of different crops based on their supply-demand dynamics.

About Me: 

I passed out from IIT-G did my bachelors in CSE and was driven with one force to create an internet conglomerate which focuses and solves the most rooted problems of the world especially developing world - India, Africa etc. I have been driven with the thought of providing 10Mn People with the livelihood whether it may be jobs or small & medium sized entrepreneurship. Since my journey, I have been focused on solving the problems in the supply chain.

I have Co-founded 2 companies in the Edu-Tech and Retail Space before and I have failed at creating the required impact. With the failure comes the learnings, In the past 6 years I have learned a lot from being a programmer to being a Business head and this has been an immense learning journey.

I haven't stopped and I will not stop. Working in the Agri-Tech from last one and half year again bootstrapped with some angel funds to run the business I have been going forward with one key thought to bring a change; to create a new era of agriculture.

The journey so far has been accompanied by financial instability which has always put me into a position where I haven't made much for myself. We are a bootstrapped company and recently got selected at Draper University. 

Getting into Draper University will definitely push me & Himikara 100 steps forward in the right direction towards our goal. Getting into Draper will ensure that we have the right knowledge, resources and connects under one roof required to create a successful conglomerate.

I am particularly inspired by Apple's Think Different Advertisement. 

 

Draper University:

I have been selected to attend Draper University's 5-week entrepreneurship program starting 1st April 2019. Draper University was started by Tim Draper - one of the most reputed Venture Capitalist in Silicon Valley who has identified and invested in disruptive companies like Hotmail, Skype. Attending this program will help me take my venture to the next level and become a world-class entrepreneur. Below is the sample curriculum.

 

Draper U & My Zero Food Wastage Dream:

Attending this program will empower us with the right tools, skills, and network to build a disruptive Agritech venture from scratch. This 5-week program organized by Draper University offers intense training to build critical skills and optimal mental framework to embark on a high impact entrepreneurial journey. People who teach at Draper University are experts from the industry, successful entrepreneurs and VCs which enables tremendous hands-on learning. Some of the past speakers include leaders like Elon Musk, Andy Tang, Ron Johnson, Bill Campbell, Bob Metcalfe and has some of the best mentors like Tina Seelig. Draper University is located in the heart of silicon valley and hence will give me access to some of the best technologists, inventors, investors and entrepreneurs from the Agritech space. I hope to bring some of them onboard to jointly build the venture I am working on. 

Goal:

The breakup of the total funding we need is below:

Tuition: $12000
Travel: $2000
Living Expenses: $1000
Scholarship: $3000
Amount to be raised: $ 12000

Even if I do not reach the entire goal, all the funds raised here would be used to fund my tuition and travel to participate in Draper University.

Other Ways You Can Help:


Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Please help me get the word out about this campaign in your network.

You can use some of the Indiegogo share tools!

A big Thank You for the share :)

story:
The Vertec Story

Vertec Laboratories was formulated with one goal in mind. That goal is to reduce emissions from fossil fuels to zero. Our research team is big on the process of Thermogenesis at the molecular level, thus reconstructing the very chemistry of fuels from gasoline, diesel, jet and bunker fuel applications.  

After years of trial and error and millions of test driven miles, we have the answer Right Here and Right Now!!

For every donation above $25USD we will ship you an  8oz. sample*.

* allow 6 to 8 weeks for delivery

 

However every penny counts. We thank you in advance for your participation.
