story:
Introducing UpSens

 

Did you know? According to the EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) the average American spends 93% of their life INDOORS. Only 7% of your entire life is spent outdoors, on average this would be 12 hours a week outdoors, while the rest is indoors.

We are all aware of the outdoor pollutants, but do we stop and think about the quality of the 93% of our life? Have you ever measured the quality of your life?

Every day we are exposed to different kinds of pollution and we think that the first step to protect ourselves is to be aware of them. So, we took all our experience, founded UpSens and worked hard on creating our device! UpSens is a stand-alone base with LCD screen on which you can connect the different sensors. Currently there are 2 sensors available, however we have many more in the pipeline.

How do I refer?


All you need to do is share your unique link (shown below) which will be found on our UpSens Indiegogo page and get your friends to pre-order using your link. Simple as that. Then your referrals will be tracked and when you reach the lucky number you will receive your FREE UpSens WAVE.

 

INDOOR CANCER RISKS: ARE YOU AWARE?

The University of Cork (Ireland) published a report in 2015 saying that a sizeable portion of the population is misinformed about cancer risk. It is not just a matter concerning cigarettes: there are a large amount of dangerous pollutants inside our home and many different sources we are not considering as a hazard. Volatile organic compounds (VOCs) are common ingredients in cosmetic products which can have an impact human health, University of Bari (Italy) says.

UpSens is a Cancer Source Sensor (CSS): a smart control device designed to find carcinogenic sources. It helps you monitoring indoor pollutants. it’s your personal CSS device.

 

MONITOR THE WAVE, DO NOT LET IT CRASH YOU DOWN

Exposure to electromagnetic fields have been linked to the development of tumors. Researches conducted in Sweden by Orebo and Lund Universities say that a high percentage (1 on 12) of cavies during experiments developed either malignant cancer (brain and rare heart tumors) or precancerous lesions that can lead to cancer.

Asian Pacific Journal of Cancer Prevention published research based on a meta-analysis of 18 studies, this meta-analysis suggests that EMF exposure may be associated with the increase risk of cancer.

WAVE detects the electromagnetic radiation produced by electronic devices.

You can use it at home or keep it on your desk at work to monitor the instant level of electro-smog or to measure the average value of the last 6 minutes. We set these two different options because an important factor is not to stay exposed for a long time to high electro-smog levels.

We would like to give you a new lease of life, allowing you to avoid the impacts of electro-smog on your welfare.

 

INDOOR AIR POLLUTION AND HEALTH

Health effects from indoor air pollutants may be experienced soon after exposure or possibly even years later. Immediate effects may show up after single exposure or repeated exposures. These include irritation of the eyes, nose, and throat, headaches, dizziness, and fatigue. Other health effects may show up either years after exposure has occurred or only after long or repeated periods of exposure. These effects, which include some respiratory diseases, heart disease, and cancer, can be severely debilitating or fatal.

WE ALL TAKE AROUND 20,000 BREATHS EACH DAY: AIR QUALITY COUNTS

According to a report (from UK’s Royal College of Physicians and the Royal College of Pediatrics and Child Health) as many as 99,000 deaths across Europe were caused by indoor air pollution in just one year. Indoor pollution sources that release gases or particles into the air are the primary cause of indoor air quality problems in Commercial buildings and homes. Inadequate ventilation can increase indoor pollutant levels High temperature and humidity levels can also increase concentrations of some pollutants.

AIR traces the VOC, volatile organic compounds, that is harmful substances such as formaldehyde or carbon monoxide, benzene, as well as temperature and humidity. Some sources, such as building materials, furnishings, and products (like air fresheners), release pollutants continuously.

A Study across Belgium, USA, UK and Switzerland evaluates even the human health risk from scented candles. Do you mind? Whenever we cook the VOC’s (Volatile Organic Compound) levels rise dramatically. Carbon monoxide (CO) intoxication is the leading cause of death due to poisoning in the United States, many victims of CO poisoning die or suffer permanent, severe neurological injury despite treatment. In addition, as many as 50% of those who recover consciousness and survive may experience varying degree of subtler but still disabling neuropsychiatric sequela.

With the AIR sensor, we want you to monitor indoor air quality at home or at work. This measures VOC, CO, temperature and relative humidity levels.

The touch screen LCD display will show you the results giving you an instant overview, which is easy to understand due to the different colors that will explain the air quality level.

 

WE HAVE NO EXCUSES: IT WILL BE OUR FAULT!

We need to protect ourselves and the people we care about, and we need to start this inside our homes, offices and cars.

Here at UpSens we have developed a mobile app to give users the chance to share their measurements in real time, creating a map of the pollution levels in their neighborhood or city. They can also start discussions and petitions to actively change their local situation, without being influenced by authorities or other external entities.

UNITED WE STAND: BE PART OF OUR ENVIRONMENTAL REVOLUTION

 

THE UNIVERSAL BASE: IT’S EASY AS ONE, TWO, THREE.

What makes our device extraordinary is that you can connect the base with the sensor you need to use; it will work properly with all the different sensors giving you full access to measure, monitor and track the results.

 

THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS… A COMMUNITY WITHOUT A VISION

We created UpSens with a big goal in mind: to start a revolution in the perception of a quality life. UpSens sensors will be instruments to allow this and we want our community to share the info and data monitored:

  • to set petitions to change pollution problems.
  • to visualize different data collected around your neighbourhood, state, country and the whole world.
  • to take part of a new way to enrich our daily life.

That’s the reason why we created an online space where our community can discuss, share and learn from other UpSensers.

 

KNOWING IS THE FIRST STEP, BUT SHARING IS THE WAY

We strongly believe the power of our community. We want you to share your info, data and reports with the community. This will allow us to create not just a database of environmental issues, but also we want to create solutions, a database of smart ideas and to enrich ourselves with a higher quality of life.

What We Need & What You Get

We have already collected about $196,000 in equity raising and about $120,000 in another fund raising. Thanks to these funds, we can now set a low target on Indiegogo: just $35,000.

We’ll use this money to manufacture the WAVE and AIR sensors, which you can pre-order here.

But we don’t want to stop there! We have other fantastic sensors, features and surprises that we want to produce for you! Therefore, we need help now more than ever!

The more you contribute, the bigger the chance for us to achieve all our projects! You can engage with our perks to become more involved in what we are doing!

 

Risks & Challenge

If we don’t raise funds we will not be able to produce all of the other sensors we have planned. This will not affect the performance of the device as it is now, but we think it would be sad not to take advantage of its full potential.

The feedback from the users will surely highlight challenges and demands which we will take on-board and we are sure that your feedback will lead us to improve our products.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us here at UpSens. If you like our project, please help us to reach more people.

Please invite people to visit our Indiegogo page and use the Indiegogo share tools to spread our project!

ONCE UPON A TIME THERE WAS JUST A CHARMING IDEA

UpSens’ journey started As a result of many years experience in manufacturing B2B sensors. We designed, prototyped and produced many different sensors but there were no products designed to help us keep our homes safely monitored in an easy way; which we felt that had to change! Therefore, we decided to create UpSens! We decided to combine all of our expertise to help wider society.

Since the beginning we set ourselves goals, which we have continuously met. Now we have set ourselves another milestone and we need your help to reach it!

We are based in Trento, North of Italy, a place well known around the Country and in the rest of the world for its high levels of innovation, environmental protections policies and quality of life. We love to underline that from the very first step to the shop floor, everything is fully ‘Made in Italy’.

Last but not least: using the Simone Simonelli design we put the Italian style all around our device, making it a smart instrument to keep at home.

 

IT’S A GREAT IDEA AND STILL GOING STRONG

We have set different goals to be achieved for this campaign. With your help, we want to increase the device’s features and the number of sensors available. Every single action is another step to unlock a new milestone, contributing to our journey and to our vision. The more the campaign earns the more our product will help monitor our quality of life in many different areas.

 

EVERY MISSION DESERVES SUPERHEROES

A small team, with a strong know how, attitude and commitment to their job. We have many years of experience in this field and we have combined our different knowledges to take UpSens from an idea, to the shop floor and then into your homes!

 

THE BEST IS YET TO COME

Life is not a bowl of cherries, we understand this, however at UpSens we have decided to pluck up the courage and we have designed our future: this means more sensors and more pollutants to be monitored. The idea remains the same: to give you a chance to analyze and monitor the quality of your life.

 

FAQs

 

Where did the idea come from?

The UpSens team have been involved for several years in Optoi, an Italian "sensors company" that develops and produces sensors exclusively for industrial, aerospace and biotechnological companies. UpSens was born to take the use of a device that incorporated experiences gained in more than twenty years of R&D and manufacturing activities.

Where was UpSens designed?

UpSens was designed and developed entirely within the UpSens team, in Trento (North of Italy). It is not an Arduino based hardware, but a completely new development, thanks to the skills gained in several years of experience in an Italian company that manufactures sensors or several industries, including aerospace and biomedical sectors.

How is it made?

The first prototype has been made using Rapid Prototyping and 3D printing technologies. In the production phase, we will produce a technopolymer case, produced by plastic injection molding.

Who is UpSens made for?

UpSens can help everyone! Currently there is an on-going increase in awareness and sensitivity towards environmental issues that will soon become an urgent matter; this means that measuring the quality of the environments where we spend most of our days will shortly become in need for ourselves and for all the people we care about.

What I can do after the sensor measure?

UpSens will give you an overview, it’s the first step: share your results, feelings and perceptions with our community. This will allow you to stay up-to-date regarding quality of life issues and solutions. Thanks to the community you may be supported in driving action to an improvement.

Is UpSens an air purifier? Is UpSens an electrosmog reducer?

No, it is not. UpSens is a monitoring sensor, able to measure the parameters. It will allow you to monitor and track environmental conditions around you. Thanks to this and to the community you will be able to put in place action to reach a better quality of life level.

What are VOCs? And why is so important to measure them?

VOC (Volatile Organic Compounds) are a mixture of gases, for the most part harmful to our health such as benzene, toluene or formaldehyde that may be present at home and in other buildings.  They come from common detergents, pesticides, flavoring fragrances, the paints off walls and glossy resin coating off the furniture. It is important to measure them because they create a wide range of effects ranging from sensory discomfort to severe alterations to our welfare.

What CO is? And why is so important to measure it?

Carbon monoxide (CO) is a colorless and odorless gas that is made whenever a fuel burns. Breathing carbon monoxide fumes does not allow oxygen to be used properly by the body and it also causes damage to the central nervous system. It is important to measure it because with excessive concentrations it can lead to death and being a gas that cannot be smelt or seen it is indispensable to have an instrument like UpSens to detect it especially in a home with wood burning stoves, fireplaces, etc.

What will you do with the money you earn from the campaign?

Crowdfunders’ money will be used only in the manufacturing phase and if we reach the goal it will allow us to reach a first step to economics of scale, something that an hardware like UpSens requires to stay in the market.

When will the devices be sent?

First in, first out: we will ship them in the same order of receiving the crowdfunding’s orders. Orders received in the first 48 hours of campaign will be delivered by the end of 2017, after this the deadline for when we will deliver is by March 2018 onwards.

Will you ship worldwide?

Yes, we will ship the items everywhere in the world.

What will UpSens’ price be after the campaign?

UpSens’ price after the campaign will be 227.00 USD

Is UpSens under warranty?

Yes, it's under a full 12-month warranty

How can I contact you?

You may reach out by e-mail at support@upsens.com we will be at your disposal for further info and data you may need.

Does the sensor interfere with other electronic devices?

No, it does not. It interacts with smartphone to allow you to download and manage data, then to share them with UpSens community on the dedicated Platform.

Do I need to purchase all the sensors?

No, you don’t. You can, of course but you need at least one sensor to monitor the parameter you need to measure.

Can I connect UpSens’ base to devices I already own?

No, you can’t. It works properly just with UpSens sensors

Is there any limit to the number of connections I can make?

Durability tests said you can connect and de-connect the sensors reaching 10,000 times

Is UpSens safe?

Yes, it is. It respects all safety standard required for this kind of device.

How can I re-charge UpSens’ base?

You can re-charge the base using USB bus, using the cable included (the same as most of smartphones on the market).

Can I bring it with me in my pocket, bag, backpack or luggage?

Yes, you can. It is portable and you may decide to keep it on or switch it off while put in them.

Can I use it outdoor? 

Yes, you can. Operating temperature: 41°F - 104°F (5°C - 40°C), humidity below 90% RH

Can I modify the internal hardware to connect more than one sensor? 

We kindly advise you to not do such actions, it will not work. The warranty will also expire as soon as you modify the hardware.
story_txt:
Introducing UpSens Did you know? According to the EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) the average American spends 93% of their life INDOORS. Only 7% of your entire life is spent outdoors, on average this would be 12 hours a week outdoors, while the rest is indoors.We are all aware of the outdoor pollutants, but do we stop and think about the quality of the 93% of our life? Have you ever measured the quality of your life?Every day we are exposed to different kinds of pollution and we think that the first step to protect ourselves is to be aware of them. So, we took all our experience, founded UpSens and worked hard on creating our device! UpSens is a stand-alone base with LCD screen on which you can connect the different sensors. Currently there are 2 sensors available, however we have many more in the pipeline.How do I refer?All you need to do is share your unique link (shown below) which will be found on our UpSens Indiegogo page and get your friends to pre-order using your link. Simple as that. Then your referrals will be tracked and when you reach the lucky number you will receive your FREE UpSens WAVE. INDOOR CANCER RISKS: ARE YOU AWARE?The University of Cork (Ireland) published a report in 2015 saying that a sizeable portion of the population is misinformed about cancer risk. It is not just a matter concerning cigarettes: there are a large amount of dangerous pollutants inside our home and many different sources we are not considering as a hazard. Volatile organic compounds (VOCs) are common ingredients in cosmetic products which can have an impact human health, University of Bari (Italy) says.UpSens is a Cancer Source Sensor (CSS): a smart control device designed to find carcinogenic sources. It helps you monitoring indoor pollutants. it’s your personal CSS device. MONITOR THE WAVE, DO NOT LET IT CRASH YOU DOWNExposure to electromagnetic fields have been linked to the development of tumors. Researches conducted in Sweden by Orebo and Lund Universities say that a high percentage (1 on 12) of cavies during experiments developed either malignant cancer (brain and rare heart tumors) or precancerous lesions that can lead to cancer.Asian Pacific Journal of Cancer Prevention published research based on a meta-analysis of 18 studies, this meta-analysis suggests that EMF exposure may be associated with the increase risk of cancer.WAVE detects the electromagnetic radiation produced by electronic devices.You can use it at home or keep it on your desk at work to monitor the instant level of electro-smog or to measure the average value of the last 6 minutes. We set these two different options because an important factor is not to stay exposed for a long time to high electro-smog levels.We would like to give you a new lease of life, allowing you to avoid the impacts of electro-smog on your welfare. INDOOR AIR POLLUTION AND HEALTHHealth effects from indoor air pollutants may be experienced soon after exposure or possibly even years later. Immediate effects may show up after single exposure or repeated exposures. These include irritation of the eyes, nose, and throat, headaches, dizziness, and fatigue. Other health effects may show up either years after exposure has occurred or only after long or repeated periods of exposure. These effects, which include some respiratory diseases, heart disease, and cancer, can be severely debilitating or fatal.WE ALL TAKE AROUND 20,000 BREATHS EACH DAY: AIR QUALITY COUNTSAccording to a report (from UK’s Royal College of Physicians and the Royal College of Pediatrics and Child Health) as many as 99,000 deaths across Europe were caused by indoor air pollution in just one year. Indoor pollution sources that release gases or particles into the air are the primary cause of indoor air quality problems in Commercial buildings and homes. Inadequate ventilation can increase indoor pollutant levels High temperature and humidity levels can also increase concentrations of some pollutants.AIR traces the VOC, volatile organic compounds, that is harmful substances such as formaldehyde or carbon monoxide, benzene, as well as temperature and humidity. Some sources, such as building materials, furnishings, and products (like air fresheners), release pollutants continuously.A Study across Belgium, USA, UK and Switzerland evaluates even the human health risk from scented candles. Do you mind? Whenever we cook the VOC’s (Volatile Organic Compound) levels rise dramatically. Carbon monoxide (CO) intoxication is the leading cause of death due to poisoning in the United States, many victims of CO poisoning die or suffer permanent, severe neurological injury despite treatment. In addition, as many as 50% of those who recover consciousness and survive may experience varying degree of subtler but still disabling neuropsychiatric sequela.With the AIR sensor, we want you to monitor indoor air quality at home or at work. This measures VOC, CO, temperature and relative humidity levels.The touch screen LCD display will show you the results giving you an instant overview, which is easy to understand due to the different colors that will explain the air quality level. WE HAVE NO EXCUSES: IT WILL BE OUR FAULT!We need to protect ourselves and the people we care about, and we need to start this inside our homes, offices and cars.Here at UpSens we have developed a mobile app to give users the chance to share their measurements in real time, creating a map of the pollution levels in their neighborhood or city. They can also start discussions and petitions to actively change their local situation, without being influenced by authorities or other external entities.UNITED WE STAND: BE PART OF OUR ENVIRONMENTAL REVOLUTION THE UNIVERSAL BASE: IT’S EASY AS ONE, TWO, THREE.What makes our device extraordinary is that you can connect the base with the sensor you need to use; it will work properly with all the different sensors giving you full access to measure, monitor and track the results. THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS… A COMMUNITY WITHOUT A VISIONWe created UpSens with a big goal in mind: to start a revolution in the perception of a quality life. UpSens sensors will be instruments to allow this and we want our community to share the info and data monitored:
to set petitions to change pollution problems.
to visualize different data collected around your neighbourhood, state, country and the whole world.
to take part of a new way to enrich our daily life.
That’s the reason why we created an online space where our community can discuss, share and learn from other UpSensers. KNOWING IS THE FIRST STEP, BUT SHARING IS THE WAYWe strongly believe the power of our community. We want you to share your info, data and reports with the community. This will allow us to create not just a database of environmental issues, but also we want to create solutions, a database of smart ideas and to enrich ourselves with a higher quality of life.What We Need & What You GetWe have already collected about $196,000 in equity raising and about $120,000 in another fund raising. Thanks to these funds, we can now set a low target on Indiegogo: just $35,000.We’ll use this money to manufacture the WAVE and AIR sensors, which you can pre-order here.But we don’t want to stop there! We have other fantastic sensors, features and surprises that we want to produce for you! Therefore, we need help now more than ever!The more you contribute, the bigger the chance for us to achieve all our projects! You can engage with our perks to become more involved in what we are doing! Risks & ChallengeIf we don’t raise funds we will not be able to produce all of the other sensors we have planned. This will not affect the performance of the device as it is now, but we think it would be sad not to take advantage of its full potential.The feedback from the users will surely highlight challenges and demands which we will take on-board and we are sure that your feedback will lead us to improve our products. Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us here at UpSens. If you like our project, please help us to reach more people.Please invite people to visit our Indiegogo page and use the Indiegogo share tools to spread our project!ONCE UPON A TIME THERE WAS JUST A CHARMING IDEAUpSens’ journey started As a result of many years experience in manufacturing B2B sensors. We designed, prototyped and produced many different sensors but there were no products designed to help us keep our homes safely monitored in an easy way; which we felt that had to change! Therefore, we decided to create UpSens! We decided to combine all of our expertise to help wider society.Since the beginning we set ourselves goals, which we have continuously met. Now we have set ourselves another milestone and we need your help to reach it!We are based in Trento, North of Italy, a place well known around the Country and in the rest of the world for its high levels of innovation, environmental protections policies and quality of life. We love to underline that from the very first step to the shop floor, everything is fully ‘Made in Italy’.Last but not least: using the Simone Simonelli design we put the Italian style all around our device, making it a smart instrument to keep at home. IT’S A GREAT IDEA AND STILL GOING STRONGWe have set different goals to be achieved for this campaign. With your help, we want to increase the device’s features and the number of sensors available. Every single action is another step to unlock a new milestone, contributing to our journey and to our vision. The more the campaign earns the more our product will help monitor our quality of life in many different areas. EVERY MISSION DESERVES SUPERHEROESA small team, with a strong know how, attitude and commitment to their job. We have many years of experience in this field and we have combined our different knowledges to take UpSens from an idea, to the shop floor and then into your homes! THE BEST IS YET TO COMELife is not a bowl of cherries, we understand this, however at UpSens we have decided to pluck up the courage and we have designed our future: this means more sensors and more pollutants to be monitored. The idea remains the same: to give you a chance to analyze and monitor the quality of your life. FAQs Where did the idea come from?The UpSens team have been involved for several years in Optoi, an Italian "sensors company" that develops and produces sensors exclusively for industrial, aerospace and biotechnological companies. UpSens was born to take the use of a device that incorporated experiences gained in more than twenty years of R&D and manufacturing activities.Where was UpSens designed?UpSens was designed and developed entirely within the UpSens team, in Trento (North of Italy). It is not an Arduino based hardware, but a completely new development, thanks to the skills gained in several years of experience in an Italian company that manufactures sensors or several industries, including aerospace and biomedical sectors.How is it made?The first prototype has been made using Rapid Prototyping and 3D printing technologies. In the production phase, we will produce a technopolymer case, produced by plastic injection molding.Who is UpSens made for?UpSens can help everyone! Currently there is an on-going increase in awareness and sensitivity towards environmental issues that will soon become an urgent matter; this means that measuring the quality of the environments where we spend most of our days will shortly become in need for ourselves and for all the people we care about.What I can do after the sensor measure?UpSens will give you an overview, it’s the first step: share your results, feelings and perceptions with our community. This will allow you to stay up-to-date regarding quality of life issues and solutions. Thanks to the community you may be supported in driving action to an improvement.Is UpSens an air purifier? Is UpSens an electrosmog reducer?No, it is not. UpSens is a monitoring sensor, able to measure the parameters. It will allow you to monitor and track environmental conditions around you. Thanks to this and to the community you will be able to put in place action to reach a better quality of life level.What are VOCs? And why is so important to measure them?VOC (Volatile Organic Compounds) are a mixture of gases, for the most part harmful to our health such as benzene, toluene or formaldehyde that may be present at home and in other buildings.  They come from common detergents, pesticides, flavoring fragrances, the paints off walls and glossy resin coating off the furniture. It is important to measure them because they create a wide range of effects ranging from sensory discomfort to severe alterations to our welfare.What CO is? And why is so important to measure it?Carbon monoxide (CO) is a colorless and odorless gas that is made whenever a fuel burns. Breathing carbon monoxide fumes does not allow oxygen to be used properly by the body and it also causes damage to the central nervous system. It is important to measure it because with excessive concentrations it can lead to death and being a gas that cannot be smelt or seen it is indispensable to have an instrument like UpSens to detect it especially in a home with wood burning stoves, fireplaces, etc.What will you do with the money you earn from the campaign?Crowdfunders’ money will be used only in the manufacturing phase and if we reach the goal it will allow us to reach a first step to economics of scale, something that an hardware like UpSens requires to stay in the market.When will the devices be sent?First in, first out: we will ship them in the same order of receiving the crowdfunding’s orders. Orders received in the first 48 hours of campaign will be delivered by the end of 2017, after this the deadline for when we will deliver is by March 2018 onwards.Will you ship worldwide?Yes, we will ship the items everywhere in the world.What will UpSens’ price be after the campaign?UpSens’ price after the campaign will be 227.00 USDIs UpSens under warranty?Yes, it's under a full 12-month warrantyHow can I contact you?You may reach out by e-mail at support@upsens.com we will be at your disposal for further info and data you may need.Does the sensor interfere with other electronic devices?No, it does not. It interacts with smartphone to allow you to download and manage data, then to share them with UpSens community on the dedicated Platform.Do I need to purchase all the sensors?No, you don’t. You can, of course but you need at least one sensor to monitor the parameter you need to measure.Can I connect UpSens’ base to devices I already own?No, you can’t. It works properly just with UpSens sensorsIs there any limit to the number of connections I can make?Durability tests said you can connect and de-connect the sensors reaching 10,000 timesIs UpSens safe?Yes, it is. It respects all safety standard required for this kind of device.How can I re-charge UpSens’ base?You can re-charge the base using USB bus, using the cable included (the same as most of smartphones on the market).Can I bring it with me in my pocket, bag, backpack or luggage?Yes, you can. It is portable and you may decide to keep it on or switch it off while put in them.Can I use it outdoor? Yes, you can. Operating temperature: 41°F - 104°F (5°C - 40°C), humidity below 90% RHCan I modify the internal hardware to connect more than one sensor? We kindly advise you to not do such actions, it will not work. The warranty will also expire as soon as you modify the hardware.

story:
Una de las actividades cotidianas que tiene un enorme consumo y es súper nociva para el ambiente es la ducha. En una ducha se puede contaminar entre 80 y 120 litros de agua y por supuesto generar un gasto energético al calentar nuevamente el agua. ¿Pero sería posible prescindir de una buena ducha? ¿Cuáles son los efectos ambientales si cada persona en nuestra comunidad toma un baño diariamente? Imagínense un millón de personas contaminando una media de 100 litros de agua en un día...

DuchECO, acrónimo de “ducha ecológica” es un puntero de ducha que ahorra 70 % de agua y logra una eficiencia energética de 300 % por encima de lo convencional sin requerir de otra clase de energía externa. En igual manera es el porcentaje en el que contribuimos al planeta. Esto es posible por una propiedad física llamada efecto Venturi la cual mediante la disminución de la sección por donde pasa el liquido se genera un vacío que succiona y mezcla el aire con el agua.

  • D1 Agua
  • D2 Aire

Es real, lo uso a diario. Apenas tuve el primer prototipo funcional lo instale y cambio por completo la experiencia de un refrescante baño.
 

Menos de 30 segundos de instalación!


Mi nombre es Fredd, tengo 24 años y soy el inventor de Ducheco. En el 2002 mi país se vio afectado por una crisis. Fue tan grave que incluso muchas personas se suicidaron al perder los ahorros de toda su vida. Los efectos perduraron por varios años. En esos años siendo yo un chico muy curioso, mientras mis padres trataban de mantener la cordura, yo le preguntaba a mi madre por qué teníamos que iluminarnos con velas y por qué estaba poniendo agua caliente de una olla a un balde. Mi madre astuta y sabiendo que yo era un chico desafiante dijo que por unos días jugaríamos a estar en un campamento. ¿Y para qué el agua? - insistí yo; a lo que papá contestó que en un campamento no hay duchas y que así se bañaban cuando iba al liceo militar. El primer pensamiento que cruzó mi mente era que estaban totalmente locos, lo de las velas era divertido hasta por ahí no más, pero ¿cómo papá creía que me podría bañar con un balde de agua, cuando solo tiene 10 litros y a veces no me daba con el calefón de 80? Luego de largas e inútiles persuasiones no accedí hasta ser desafiado. ¿Qué? ¿Acaso no puedes? - dijo mi padre. Podrían hasta haberme obligado, atado y tratado de bañar a la fuerza, pero desafíame y haré todo lo posible por demostrarte que puedo e incluso lo haré mejor de lo que piensan. Para mi sorpresa con medio balde ya me había bañado y tenia medio balde más para divertirme. Jamás imaginé que aquella humilde experiencia fuera luego de tantos años algo más que una enseñanza, un escalón más para crear lo que hoy en día llamo Ducheco.
Ya adulto, al vivir solo no necesitaría un calentador de agua de más de 20 litros o al menos eso pensaba yo.

El primer verano era genial, me sobraba para bañarme, tenía poco consumo y calentaba rápido. Me permitía darme varios baños en el día, luego de la playa, el gimnasio y el trabajo. Pero no fue hasta el invierno de ese mismo año que me di cuenta que al estar el agua del grifo más fría que en verano, el rendimiento de mi calefón se había ido a poco más de 3 minutos, lo que definitivamente no me alcanzaba para bañarme. Consideré comprar un calefón más grande, pero no estaba dentro de las posibilidades de mi presupuesto. También se me ocurrió conseguir ducheros con mayor rendimiento pero los que habían en mi país no tenían mejoras significativas además de tener que instalar un sistema totalmente diferente. Fuera del país encontré 2 modelos (e-shower y nebia) que también ahorran un 70% pero el precio de ellos más el envió me costaba lo mismo que un calefón más grande. Ya a punto de tirar la toalla recorde esa enseñaza de pequeño y opte por crear mi propia solución la que luego materialice en mi impresora 3D.


La superficie marina cumple una función fundamental para el planeta. Ésta refleja gran parte de la radiación solar hacia el espacio ayudando a que la temperatura global se mantenga estable. Al generar menos contaminación cuidamos de los espejos marinos.


Por un lado reducimos el uso de las plantas purificadoras logrando ahorrar mucha energía. Por otra parte el ahorro de 70 % de agua a su vez genera una eficiencia energética de hasta 300 % lo que te permitirá ahorrar energía que probablemente provenga de una fuente contaminante.


Ducheco es elaborado con material (ABS) reciclado.


En la mayoría de los casos el agua es obtenida de ríos y lagos donde sus ecosistemas se ven comprometidos por la continua perdida de agua, cambios en su temperatura y composición por la acción del hombre. También vertimos nuestros desechos en ellos.
Por eso ¡cada litro cuenta!


Se descongestionan los sistemas de alcantarillado y se generan menos desechos los cuales son drenados al mar o al océano.


Si generamos menos emisiones de CO2, preservamos los ecosistemas involucrados,  conservamos los espejos marinos y cuidamos la naturaleza tenemos el extintor perfecto para el calentamiento global.

¿Como puedes ayudar y que obtienes a cambio?

Las recompensas las podrás encontrar en la parte superior en la columna derecha. Cada colaborador recibirá su recompensa si y solo si se llega al 100% del objetivo antes de finalizado el plazo para cumplirlo. De lo contrario, le sera devuelto el dinero íntegramente.
Ducheco tampoco recibirá el dinero hasta 15 días después de alcanzar el plazo estipulado y cumplir la meta antes de dicho plazo.

Mi deseo y objetivo es que entre todos evitemos la contaminación de 100 millones de litros de agua diarios, 36.500 millones anualmente. Invito a todos a que tomemos conciencia y que actuemos...

Contemos juntos! empezando por mi:

Sin duda, esta es solo la punta del iceberg del equipo, muchas personas entre familiares y amigos son los principales colaboradores y promotores de Ducheco.

 

Recuerda que Ducheco no es la única forma de ayudar. Si no tienes la posibilidad de adquirirlo también puedes tomar medidas para evitar el desperdicio innecesario de agua recordando cerrar cualquier canilla, tomando un baño más corto y arreglando toda aquella pérdida que pueda existir. Y, si te a gustado la idea puedes compartirla en las redes sociales para que más personas se unan a nuestra causa.

Sin duda, esta es solo la punta del iceberg del equipo, muchas personas entre familiares y amigos son los principales colaboradores y promotores de Ducheco.
 

Recuerda que Ducheco no es la única forma de ayudar. Si no tienes la posibilidad de adquirirlo también puedes tomar medidas para evitar el desperdicio innecesario de agua recordando cerrar cualquier canilla, tomando un baño más corto y arreglando toda aquella pérdida que pueda existir. Y, si te a gustado la idea puedes compartirla en las redes sociales para que más personas se unan a nuestra causa.

story:
Does this sound familiar?

Forget the tea kettle was on and SCORCH it?

Have you ever yelled, “WHO LEFT THE BURNER ON?!”

Distracted by a phone call while cooking on the stove?

Ever pick up a pot from a burner you thought was OFF and burn yourself?

Worried someone you know will forget the stove is ON?

Have you been multi-tasking and nearly caused a stove fire?

Have you left the house and wondered if all the burners were turned OFF?

BurnerAlert as a Reminder

BurnerAlert is a small, thin plastic disc that attaches easily to your stove knob. When the knob is turned on, BurnerAlert will beep and blink to remind you your burner is on. The beeping and blinking occur at timed intervals of 3 minutes, 9 minutes, 15 minutes and then every 15 minutes.


The BurnerAlert Story:

How do you REMIND someone that the stove burner was left ON unintentionally? The solution may not be very sexy, but it works darn well!

Hi, my name is Matthew Porraro

    and I developed BurnerAlert because there was NO existing product for the stove that could help me prevent the numerous incidents of burned pots, burned hands and near misses in my home. There were numerous times when someone had inadvertently left the gas burner ON under a pot or kettle.  I was tired of burning my hands after going to pick up a pot from the stove and finding it red hot because the burner had been left on low.  It was so frustrating!  It was out of my frustration and concern for myself and my family that I developed BurnerAlert.

Did you know?

    Did you know that unattended cooking is not only the leading cause of home fires in the United States but is the leading cause of home fires worldwide. This data comes directly from the National Fire Protection Association and the United Nations.

Our Objective:

    Our goal is to put BurnerAlerts on every stove in the world and help reduce the number of incidents of burns, property damage, home fires, and personal tragedies.

Your contributions will help us put BurnerAlerts on stoves throughout the world and with each BurnerAlert installed we will change our lives.

Go to www.BurnerAlert.com for more info.


Demo of Burneralert:


What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $175,000 in initial funding.

How funds will be used:

The funds from this campaign will be used to create the first production run of BurnerAlert - specifically, tooling for the plastics molds, final package design, internet marketing and advertising, fabrication and distribution of the first model of Generation 1 called Model A.

Generation 1 Models:

  1. Model A: Designed for standard gas and electric stoves. (Now)
  2. Model T: Designed for outdoor Gas Grills. (future-next spring)
  3. Model X: Designed for recreational vehicles and boats. (future-next spring)
  4. Model Y: Designed for Ovens.(future-by year end)
  5. Model Z: Designed for people with hearing and sight loss. (future-by year end)

The Perks:

Contributors will receive the world's first and only BurnerAlert(s). Please see perks for more details.

Electric Stoves                                                                         Gas Stoves

The Cooking Timer:

I almost forgot to tell you about an unintended secondary design feature. BurnerAlert can be used as a cooking timer. BurnerAlert can time your perfect 3 minute soft boiled eggs, 9 minute pastas, 15 and 30 minute rices and so on. I discovered this timer feature when I was sauteing bok choy and broccoli.  Each stove knob can be its own cooking timer.

Go to www.BurnerAlert.com for more info.

Your Impact Can Be Worldwide:

  • I cannot overstate the importance of your contributions to making BurnerAlert a success. Each time BurnerAlerts are installed on a stove is one more time we change our lives and perhaps even save a life.

There is no better way to help make BurnerAlert a success than telling 3 of your friends or family.

  • Please share the BurnerAlert story, website and Indiegogo on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, through email, and by good old fashioned word of mouth.
  • Share with your local volunteer or paid Fire Department.
  • Share with your local Housing Authority.
  • Share with your local Assisted Living Home.
  • Go to www.BurnerAlert.com for more info.

story:
This will change the world

 

3D printing homes will allow us to create homes that will have no electric or heat bills, low water usage, grow food in attached solariums, and charge electric cars for free in the garage.

story:
New energy vehicles
Together support new energy vehicles
Today, mankind has once again come to the crossroads of the transformation of the transportation energy power system. The third revolution will replace oil and internal combustion engine with electricity and power batteries (including fuel cells), and bring mankind into the era of clean energy. We boldly predict that the third revolution of the transportation energy power system will drive the economic take-off

story:
Waterloo V2 preparing for V3

*Strategies on outreach

*Organizing groups

*Creating directories to connect with businesses

*Organizing retainer pools 

*Networking 

*Creating discussion panels 

*and much more.

 

The Waterloo V2 is a 100% non-partisan endeavor. An event like this could be perceived as a challenge to entities with certain political motivations. So we have to be careful not to be swayed by potential outside agitators and saboteurs who wish to undermine a positive project of this magnitude.

story:
This project is brought to you by NG Laboratories:

The NG Energy Water Re-Charger Pack 

Recharge all your mobile devices anywhere, using the NG Re-Charger Pack: a water based generator.

The NG Energy Water Re-Charger Pack 

Charge all your mobile devices using normal tap water as fuel on the go no matter where you are. All you need is… just water. Not salt water, but just normal tap water. Or even rainy water!

The NG Energy Water Re-Charger Pack delivers to your phone, smart-phone, tablet or iPad a continuous supply of energy using nothing more then normal tap water as fuel.

Just fill up the container of the NG Energy Water Re-Charger with about two pounds of water and immediately it will start generate energy and charge its internal battery. 

             

It does not require salt water or any other special type of liquid to generate electricity. 
You can even use distilled water.

How It Works?

NG Water generator has a built-in 2800mAh li-ion rechargeable battery which is permanently charged and recharged by a water cell containing a range of electrodes made from a special metal alloy containing aluminum and copper, 

-  In time some of these electrodes will be consumed in the electrolytic process. If you use the NG Water Recharger only in week-ends the water cell will work without any problems for almost one full year.
- In a very intense usage (like in a daily usage) the water cell will work without any problem for more then a month. The replacement cost of the water cell will be about 15 USD, much cheaper then standard batteries.

All in a compact size, stainless steel finishes:

This new technology it's part of a patent registered at "The State Office for Inventions and Trademarks" - OSIM Bucharest Romania - www.osim.ro
Patent No.: R02013 00029 U1:

The patent belongs to Mr. IONESCU IULIU; Head of Research and Development at NG Laboratories.

What is the production plan?

After finishing the tests we intend to begin the mass production. This is why we need the found for. The vast majority of the fund raised here will provide us with the possibility to start the production process. We already are in the process of renting a 10000 square feets industrial space and we need to buy the necessary production tools. 

If successfully funded, the first products will be produced in the beginning of November 2014.

Why IndieGoGo?

Mainly because we want to keep our individual independence and not be associated within a large corporation.

We intend that the NG Water Re-Charger to be made for normal people like you and me. All of us use smartphones and tablets 24/7 and we are constantly connected. Our device allows you to stay in touch with friends and families while you’re traveling, especially if you travel into very remote areas where energy sources are scarce or completely missing.

The compact and durable design allows you to slip it in your backpack or even a small bag for easy, hassle-free use.

The Team:


F.A.Q.:

1. How much water do I need?
    The water cell will need about two pounds of water in order to properly work.

2. How frequently do I need to change the water?
    It is recommendable to change the water once a mounth.

3. Will it heat up during work?
    No. It is whatever true that any electrolytic process generate heat. But due to the new and innovative approach and due to the electronic circuit inside, in NG Water Re-Charger Pack the temperature will only raise with two or three degree centigrade. On the outside this small increase will not be at all noticeable.

4. Will it work in sub-zero temperatures?
     Yes it will. When in use, and if the temperatures are only a few degree centigrade below zero (like -3°C-5°C) the very small heat produced by the electrolytic process will keep the generator working. If you travel in areas with many degrees below zero (-15°C -20°C) then it is necessarily to add and mix a few dozens grams (or about 15%) of pure alcohol in the water.

5. How many times will I be able to charge my Smart-Phone?
    If you'll use the NG Recharger only in the week-ends you will be able to use it for about a year. If you will use it daily, you will be able to use it for about two mounths. The electrolytic water cell and the 2800mAh internal battery will easy be capable of fully recharge a normal smart phone at least twice a day.

6. How many hours of light will deliver?
    If you intend to use it for lighting a room or a tent using the included 12 LED lamp, then it will generate enough power for the LED's to continuously light for two months.

7. What is the shelf life of the product?
    The product comes with a 24 months warranty. If properly used, the product will last for at least 5 to 8 years.

8. Will there be future versions of NG Water ReCharger?

    Yes. We intend to bring to the general public new and highly improved versions. We intend that in mid 2015 to put on the market a more powerful one, (but about the same sizes) for laptops.

9. When will I get it?
    We are sure that the first deliveries will start in the first week from November 2014. We are confident that all the pledges will be fulfilled by the end of this year.


Risks and challenges

First, is the international certification. After our initial prototype testing, we will need to send it to a certification organization for them to completely inspect our product in order to comply with the EU, USA, Canada and other countries regulation. This inspection includes electromagnetic compatibility, restriction of hazardous substances compliance and electronic security certification. 

Second, is the mass production. Mass manufacturing isn’t the same thing as building a prototype. We will need to prepare a standard operating procedure to make sure mass production is efficiently building high-quality products.

However, due to our experience and expertise we are very confident that all this challenges will be successfully accomplished.

We have been in development on this project for more than two years and with your help we believe we can deliver a product that people will love.

story:
Modern design, carefree vacation.

The SUN WAVE smart sun lounger will make your vacation even more carefree. Modern design and functions that make your stay on the beach or in the public pool more pleasurable are the basic features of the deck chair.

The idea came from thinking about a summer vacation and pleasant stay in the sun. But with all the pleasant things to which we associate summer, sea or swimming pool unfortunately there are unpleasant moments which can turn perfect holiday into a disaster.

Today, smart phones and gadgets have become an integral part of our everyday lives. Without them we will not go anywhere. Relaxing music while lying in the sun and watching the islands in the distance, the videos that make the most beautiful memories which we'll remember years to come, photos of us we send to friends while we enjoy on the beach... we can have it all in any moment thanks to the technology advancements, but more advanced technology require much more energy to work.

Almost certainly you will not go to the beach or the swimming pool without a wallet containing all your documents, money and cards. The first problem that appears when you enter the sea or the pool is that you have to leave all your valuable things without supervision, and you risk having your dream vacation turned into a nightmare.

 

The SUN WAVE smart lounger makes you carefree. The safety deposit box integrated in the deck chair will allow you to go swimming without worrying about your valuables. Simply put all the valuable items into the drawer or in the safe. Your valuables remain in a clean, dry and safe place while you enjoy swimming. The safe is locked by a four-digit code which each user can program at their own discretion. If it happens that for some reason you forget the password the safe can be opened with the key. If the deck chair is set on a public beach or near the public swimming pool, the operator who cares about renting and maintaining the deck chair has a key.

Once you get out of the sea or the swimming pool knowing that your valuables are safe, it's time to enjoy. Sunbathing and absorbing the precious energy that the sun gives us is very important to our health. However, not only our body's use free solar energy, the SUN WAVE smart deck chair also use the sun's energy benefits. The combination of high technology and the inexhaustible natural energy source make us enjoy lazing in the sun, relaxed by the sounds of our favorite music without worrying about the battery of our smartphone, tablet or I-pad. The high-quality solar cells integrated into the wooden part of the deck provide the necessary power to charge 12V battery through which a USB charger is supplied. USB charger is protected from moisture and water and specially adapted to the environment in which it is located.

SUN WAVE Lounger that suits your needs.


The philosophy of the design of the smart lounger originated primarily from the above-mentioned needs which became the necessity of a comfortable stay on the beach or in the public swimming pool. However, this story opens up a pile of new upgrade options depending on the wishes and needs of the user. From basic setting for the private pools with the tray and USB charger to the exclusive hotel variants with integrated mini speaker, Wi-Fi signal enhancer, cordless charger and staff bell.

  • Usb charger - 5W power supply charger integrated into the lower stand of the lounger, connected to a 12V battery capacity 7.5 Ah, protected from moisture and water. The usb charger is also available in a variant without a solar module. This variant is suitable for private users and closed-type swimming pools where charging the battery with photovoltaic cells has no effect. In this case, the battery is charged with a special charger that can be connected to a 220V network. (available now)
  • The solar module - made of high quality monocrystalline photovoltaic cells which are parallel-serial connected to a module that generates up to 20W of electricity per hour. The module is protected from the weather conditions by a waterproof cover made of extra clear tempered glass integrated into the wooden part of the deck chair. (available now)
  • Safe box - digital safe with internal storage dimensions of 225x165x100mm, with individual combination of numbers, independent power supply and key for the opening in case of forgetting passwords. (available now)
  • Waterproof Staff bell - waterproof call button suitable for outdoor environment. Whenever deckchair user need help, he can press the service button. The servant will know which deck chair need service through the receiver and transmitter. (available on request)
  • Bluetooth loudspeaker - a mini bluetooth loudspeaker integrated in the lower stand of lounger support any Bluetooth enabled mobile device. (available on request)
  • Wi-Fi signal enhancer - Wi-Fi signal enhancer can be installed to allow use of the wireless hotel network regardless of distance. It is also possible to provide internet packages in cooperation with the leading provider of telecom services in the country. (available on request)
  • Wireless Charger - If your cell phone supports wireless charging, just put it in the "plus" sign on the tray bottom and wait for it to be charged. An ideal variant for charging your mobile phone while you go to swim. (available on request)

The combination of modern design, modern technology and the high quality materials

SUN WAVE, name which is associated with summer relaxation by the sea, stems from the unique form of smart lounger. Like the wave, this deck chair absorbs the sun energy to give the user all the comfort they require. With simple and pure minimalist form it fits in every ambiance. From the sandy beach to the hotel pool, from the lake to the terrace next to your home. Wherever a smart sun lounger is located, it will be emphasized both by its design and carefully planned ergonomics. Caring about the details as well as the usage of highest quality materials and the built-in equipment guarantee durability and preserving aesthetic characteristics in all weather conditions.

The main construction made of bent aluminum tubes can withstand very heavy loads, the carrying capacity of the construction is over 250kg. Aluminum, material which is known for its high carrying capacity is resistant to the corrosion and extreme weather conditions. Aluminum construction is protected by special protective coatings.

The enormous attention is devoted to the wood as a material used for the deck of the lounger, both in the type of wood and in the details that ensure comfort and safety in use. Teak with its mechanical and aesthetic characteristics is the most precious wood used in shipbuilding for making wooden parts on luxury yachts as well as for garden furniture exposed to constant changes in humidity and temperature. Teak does not require any maintenance except occasional oil coating to restore the original color and shine.

Despite all advantages of the modern design and quality materials, what distinguishes this lounger from all others is primarily its function. Everything starts with a solar module discreetly integrated into the body of a sun-lounger protected from weather conditions with tempered glass cover. This module charge battery which provides the power needed to operate all of the functions mentioned above. All system components are located in the space inside the lower stand of the deck chair and are provided with easy access and replacement in case of maintenance or eventual failure of a particular component.

The system is designed to provide a simple upgrade of the basic variant with additional functions,

An important part in term of functionality are hidden castors intended for easy moving of lounger without the need to lift and carry.

Our story - from idea to execution

With the advancement of the technology Sun becomes an increasingly important source of energy. Many interesting projects both in Croatia and all over the world have already been realized and the electricity generated by photovoltaic panels has become an integral part of our everyday life. From photovoltaic panels mounted on rooftops of family houses to solar trees, street lighting, smart benches, bus stops ... All of these projects lead us to the green future and make our daily life simpler. All this was guided to the idea, but still my first association to the word Sun was time spent on the beach ... and so it comes the idea, to take  potential of solar energy when and where it has the highest intensity.

SUN WAVE smart lounger is a combination of idea, contemporary design with the signed by famous Croatian designer Mrs. Carmen Mikuš, and applied technical and technological solutions.

 

Result - an ecological approach for a carefree vacation

Everything we want to bring from the holidays are beautiful memories. The SUN WAVE smart sun lounger will allow you to memorize your vacation as a pleasure.

Sustainability, ecology, design and functionality as the foundation of modern tourism provide great potential for this product. Our goal is to improve the existing offer on the market for tourism equipment with an environmentally friendly product and to continue to develop similar products that will make a step forward in the development of ecological tourism.

 

Support our step towards development of eco-tourism :)

Your valuables remain in a clean, dry and safe place while you enjoy swimming. The safe is locked by a four-digit code which each user can program at their own discretion. If it happens that for some reason you forget the password the safe can be opened with the key. If the deck chair is set on a public beach or near the public swimming pool, the operator who cares about renting and maintaining the deck chair has a key.Once you get out of the sea or the swimming pool knowing that your valuables are safe, it's time to enjoy. Sunbathing and absorbing the precious energy that the sun gives us is very important to our health. However, not only our body's use free solar energy, the SUN WAVE smart deck chair also use the sun's energy benefits. The combination of high technology and the inexhaustible natural energy source make us enjoy lazing in the sun, relaxed by the sounds of our favorite music without worrying about the battery of our smartphone, tablet or I-pad. The high-quality solar cells integrated into the wooden part of the deck provide the necessary power to charge 12V battery through which a USB charger is supplied. USB charger is protected from moisture and water and specially adapted to the environment in which it is located.SUN WAVE Lounger that suits your needs.The philosophy of the design of the smart lounger originated primarily from the above-mentioned needs which became the necessity of a comfortable stay on the beach or in the public swimming pool. However, this story opens up a pile of new upgrade options depending on the wishes and needs of the user. From basic setting for the private pools with the tray and USB charger to the exclusive hotel variants with integrated mini speaker, Wi-Fi signal enhancer, cordless charger and staff bell.

Usb charger - 5W power supply charger integrated into the lower stand of the lounger, connected to a 12V battery capacity 7.5 Ah, protected from moisture and water. The usb charger is also available in a variant without a solar module. This variant is suitable for private users and closed-type swimming pools where charging the battery with photovoltaic cells has no effect. In this case, the battery is charged with a special charger that can be connected to a 220V network. (available now)

The solar module - made of high quality monocrystalline photovoltaic cells which are parallel-serial connected to a module that generates up to 20W of electricity per hour. The module is protected from the weather conditions by a waterproof cover made of extra clear tempered glass integrated into the wooden part of the deck chair. (available now)

Safe box - digital safe with internal storage dimensions of 225x165x100mm, with individual combination of numbers, independent power supply and key for the opening in case of forgetting passwords. (available now)

Waterproof Staff bell - waterproof call button suitable for outdoor environment. Whenever deckchair user need help, he can press the service button. The servant will know which deck chair need service through the receiver and transmitter. (available on request)

Bluetooth loudspeaker - a mini bluetooth loudspeaker integrated in the lower stand of lounger support any Bluetooth enabled mobile device. (available on request)

Wi-Fi signal enhancer - Wi-Fi signal enhancer can be installed to allow use of the wireless hotel network regardless of distance. It is also possible to provide internet packages in cooperation with the leading provider of telecom services in the country. (available on request)

Wireless Charger - If your cell phone supports wireless charging, just put it in the "plus" sign on the tray bottom and wait for it to be charged. An ideal variant for charging your mobile phone while you go to swim. (available on request)
The combination of modern design, modern technology and the high quality materialsSUN WAVE, name which is associated with summer relaxation by the sea, stems from the unique form of smart lounger. Like the wave, this deck chair absorbs the sun energy to give the user all the comfort they require. With simple and pure minimalist form it fits in every ambiance. From the sandy beach to the hotel pool, from the lake to the terrace next to your home. Wherever a smart sun lounger is located, it will be emphasized both by its design and carefully planned ergonomics. Caring about the details as well as the usage of highest quality materials and the built-in equipment guarantee durability and preserving aesthetic characteristics in all weather conditions.The main construction made of bent aluminum tubes can withstand very heavy loads, the carrying capacity of the construction is over 250kg. Aluminum, material which is known for its high carrying capacity is resistant to the corrosion and extreme weather conditions. Aluminum construction is protected by special protective coatings.The enormous attention is devoted to the wood as a material used for the deck of the lounger, both in the type of wood and in the details that ensure comfort and safety in use. Teak with its mechanical and aesthetic characteristics is the most precious wood used in shipbuilding for making wooden parts on luxury yachts as well as for garden furniture exposed to constant changes in humidity and temperature. Teak does not require any maintenance except occasional oil coating to restore the original color and shine.Despite all advantages of the modern design and quality materials, what distinguishes this lounger from all others is primarily its function. Everything starts with a solar module discreetly integrated into the body of a sun-lounger protected from weather conditions with tempered glass cover. This module charge battery which provides the power needed to operate all of the functions mentioned above. All system components are located in the space inside the lower stand of the deck chair and are provided with easy access and replacement in case of maintenance or eventual failure of a particular component.The system is designed to provide a simple upgrade of the basic variant with additional functions,An important part in term of functionality are hidden castors intended for easy moving of lounger without the need to lift and carry.Our story - from idea to executionWith the advancement of the technology Sun becomes an increasingly important source of energy. Many interesting projects both in Croatia and all over the world have already been realized and the electricity generated by photovoltaic panels has become an integral part of our everyday life. From photovoltaic panels mounted on rooftops of family houses to solar trees, street lighting, smart benches, bus stops ... All of these projects lead us to the green future and make our daily life simpler. All this was guided to the idea, but still my first association to the word Sun was time spent on the beach ... and so it comes the idea, to take  potential of solar energy when and where it has the highest intensity.SUN WAVE smart lounger is a combination of idea, contemporary design with the signed by famous Croatian designer Mrs. Carmen Mikuš, and applied technical and technological solutions. Result - an ecological approach for a carefree vacationEverything we want to bring from the holidays are beautiful memories. The SUN WAVE smart sun lounger will allow you to memorize your vacation as a pleasure.Sustainability, ecology, design and functionality as the foundation of modern tourism provide great potential for this product. Our goal is to improve the existing offer on the market for tourism equipment with an environmentally friendly product and to continue to develop similar products that will make a step forward in the development of ecological tourism. Support our step towards development of eco-tourism :)

story:
Short Summary

G Labs is an incubator of innovative ideas for start-ups. Our most recent project is the "G Labs DIY Energy Pole Kit".

The G Labs DIY Energy Pole Kit aims to make renewable energy an affordable and feasible option for the general public. It features four 100-watt solar panels and a 1600-watt wind turbine at just $2,999. Traditional solar panel installations costs tens of thousands of dollars and are only efficient when given constant sunlight. Also, solar panels cannot function during the night. The Energy Pole includes the wind turbine to make up for inefficiencies in the solar panels and allow for power production during the night. The high costs and slow return of traditional solar panel kits are a major turn off to consumers who are looking for a renewable energy alternative.

The G Labs DIY Energy Pole Kit comes with a pole with respective mounting brackets to fit the solar panel and wind turbine assembly. The Energy Pole offers the flexibility of either floor mounting or roof mounting the entire assembly depending on where the most efficient position on the property lies. The Energy Pole is easy enough to assemble by yourself to avoid paying large labor costs. This allows you to assemble and disassemble as you please for times when you need it and when you don't. 

What We Need & What You Get

With this campaign, we are hoping to raise $10,000 towards kick-starting the production of our Energy Pole. Even if we don't reach our projected goal, any support from the community is a huge help to us. Supporting our campaign with $2,999 will grant you your very own DIY Energy Pole Kit when it launches. Even supporting with just $1 has its perks. You will gain access to the "G Labs Energy Club". With this, you will be guaranteed the best prices on G Labs Energy products forever. Just make sure to send us your email address.

The Impact

Supporting our campaign will help bring the world one step closer to going completely green. Current options for renewable energy are much too big of a commitment and costs a lot of money. Our low cost, low commitment alternative surely will incentivize more people to incorporate renewable energy into their lives.

Risks & Challenges

The capabilities of the Energy Pole restrict it to powering a small home at best. Due to design and cost restrictions, it may not produce enough power for people. Electricity is slowly encompassing everything in our daily lives to anywhere from your dishwasher to your car. As solar panels and wind turbines become more efficient and cheaper, as well as the help from your support, we will hope to upgrade the specs of this design to fit the needs of everyone in the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please consider sharing our campaign on any social media platforms to help spread word of the cause. Even if you can't directly support us, the act of sharing our campaign is more than enough.

story:
The sparking idea for SolRing was thinking about how to improve the world in a real, measurable way. I have asked myself: What is one of the major factors limiting the people of developing world? They are limited in access to electricity, and by extension to communication. How can you educate yourself, or work, without light? How can you communicate without charging your phone – or even listen to radio news? Power grids are not there, or they are unreliable and expensive. This is what I aim to change with SolRing.
There are existing solutions – but they are expensive. People simply cannot afford them.

Yet a lot of people can obtain an old car battery – energy storage. Maybe they already have a solar panel. Cheap smartphones can be used to control the system via a simple app – designed so that anyone can operate it. SolRing unit is the brain needed to bind all these components to form a smart energy system – one that learns and predicts the consumption, so you will not accidentally run out of power in the evening before the sun rises again.


 

KEY FEATURES OF SOLRING

  • Cheap: apart from the control unit, it uses readily available components
  • Smart: it learns from usage patterns and predicts charging cycles
  • Universality: prototype designed for solar, but future editions will allow any power source
  • Standard: no proprietary hardware connections
  • Easy to operate: simple smartphone app – via USB or remote access
  • Modular: see details below

Imagine how such a device could revolutionize the energy map – reducing or eliminating
dependence on power grids and dirty energy sources, so fighting against the global warming. It can improve the lives of millions of people – just by enabling them to have light, charge a phone or watch television, things we take for granted. It is also an excellent backup for a blackout. And off-grid areas anywhere: cottages, ships, mobile homes can benefit from SolRing, which will provide energy at lowest possible cost, in the most ecological way.

MODULARITY OF SOLRING
The roadmap for SolRing development plans adding modules as new features. There will be
modules for additional solar panels, expansion batteries, more power circuits, security cameras, fire detectors, wifi router. All these components will allow the user to build the system to suit their needs and to keep the cost as low as possible.

 

What we need & what you get
This campaign is to raise the funds to make a prototype. The design was completed at
Development Laboratories of Czech Technical University which will also build the prototype on their state-of-the-art 3D printers. This is what we need your contribution for – to build a series of 10 testing prototypes. These are a necessary step before SolRing can enter production.

Your contribution will not be lost if we don’t reach our goal. We are pursuing other means of
financing through grants and any other venue available – every bit helps us continue with the
project. We are really grateful for any contribution.

Risks & Challenges

  • Lack of funding – prototype delayed or not built. We are pursuing all available financing means: government grants, private grants, venture capital investments. We are convinced that combining all this with crowdfunding will allow us to raise enough funds to build the prototype.
  • Similar device entering the market – we are not aware of any device with comparable features being produced, or even being developed.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everybody can contribute. We would be grateful to anyone for raising the awareness of our project:

  • Like our Facebook page and share with your friends https://www.facebook.com/solring.eu/
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word of our campaign
  • Point people to our web site http://www.solring.eu/eng/ to learn more

Thank you!

- The SolRing team

story:
Campaign Summary

For each contribution of $100 USD, you will receive one ECD 'Title of Ownership’ via our company e-mail.  With each ECD 'Title of Ownership', you are entitled to one (1) residential ECD device.  The Campaign funds will be used to pay office expenses, create a ‘Proof of Concept’, build a working Prototype, locate and contract companies to manufacture the device.  When manufacturing is complete, ECD Energy Corp will request that your ECD 'Title of Ownership’ be sent back to us in order to begin the redemption process.  Once the ECD 'Title of Ownership’ is received and validated by us, we will ship the device to your doorstep with instructions on how to install.

In other words, and for simplification, for what you might spend on a date night out, you will get a ECD 'Title of Ownership’ for a revolutionary energy device (worth approx. $3,000) which will not only change the world, but will provide you with enough clean free energy to operate a standard sized home for several generations.

 

Our Commitment to “WE THE PEOPLE”

It took a while to take its form, but we have finally managed to find a fantastic solution to keep our device in the hands of “We the People” which will allow the common person to benefit from this magnificent technology. We view our invention as a true gift to the people that will revolutionize and set a new paradigm for the energy industry. One day, a miniaturized ECD device will power the hand-held smart phone or computer that you are reading this website on and it will never have to be charged.

Instead of drawing from institutional investors or venture capital and giving up full control of our great invention, we chose to take a different road to fund our start-up. Our solution is a reward-based crowd-funding campaign that will grant the “We the People” backers a right of ownership to the first residential energy devices manufactured.

 

About the ECD residential device being offered as part of the campaign   

The reward-based residential device will be around the size of a standard home air-conditioning condenser unit (the unit that is on the outside of your house). It will provide enough electricity to power a standard 4,000 sqft home for your life-time and then some. This is possible because the electro-kinetic energy used to operate the device is estimated to last for around 400 years. No additional fuel or consumable resource is ever needed to power the device. To review/read the actual provisional patent that ECD Energy Corp filed, please visit www.ecdenergy.com.
