story:
FOR ALL BACKERS PLEDGING AT A LEVEL THAT RECEIVES AT LEAST 1 S.O.S 2.0, Share on social media, and direct message us the link to your post, and we will throw in 1 Additional cable case, FREE of charge!!

 

___________________________________________

 

 

S.O.S 2.0 is for those nail biting moments. No matter what environment you're tackling, S.O.S 2.0 will be there - and because it can stand abuse, charge from the sun, and is equipped with four 3-in-1 LED S.O.S signal lights, it will never leave you stranded. Purchase the Powerbank alone, or as a package with Carabiner, Waterproof/Shockproof/Dustproof Cable Case, and 4 Ultra-Durable, 12" braided nylon, aluminum cased charging cables (micro-usb/lightening according to your preference).

Starting at only €65.

 

 

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Capacity: 20000 mAh 

Battery: Lithium Polymer, 1000+ Charge Cycles**

Charging Input: 5V/2A 

Output (top 2): 5V/2.4A, 5V/1A 

Output (bottom 2): 5V/2.4A, 5V/1A 

Water/Dustproof: IP67 

4x - 3 in 1 Led light: Torch, Strobe, SOS

Total Light Output: 200 Lumens

Solar output: 340mAh/h

Silica Gel Armor: Shockproof

FULL 20K Charge Time: 10 Hours via Micro-USB, 59 Hours via Solar 

Measurements: 18.4 x 9.5 x 2.54 cm 

Weight: 472g (1.04 lbs)

Operating Temps : 0-45 Degrees Celcius 

2 Year Manufacturer's Warranty

**less cycles if always using solar panel charge, more if charged using micro USB AC Charging

 

 

Side

 

 

Bottom

 

 

Top

 

TECHNICAL FAQ

Can the 2.0 charge my device while it's charging? YES, but only at the rate of input (aka normal rate when charging via AC, slower rate when charging via solar only)

Can the 2.0 charge more than just my phone? YES - tablets, go pro, you name it.

How long does it take to charge the 2.0 via the solar panel? 58 Hours to a FULL charge (variable based on directness of sunlight), and only 4-6 hours for enough power to re-charge your mobile. This means if you rely strictly on solar, you could charge the battery during the day, and have plenty of battery to charge your mobile at night.

About how long would it take to charge my mobile phone? Around 0.5-2 hours, depending on the capacity of your mobile device.

If I leave my battery fully charged, but don't use it, how fast will it lose charge? In roughly 2-3 months, if left totally unused, the battery will lose 20% of its stored power.

Can the S.O.S 2.0 produce output while it's being charged? aka charge other devices while simultaneously being charged? YES, but only at the rate of input (aka 340mAh from solar and 1A from wall charging).

 

4x - 3 in 1 LED Torch, Strobe, SOS Signal

 

Water/Dustproof IP67

 

USB Charging for up to 4 devices at once

 

 

Find your chosen reward below. Whether you want just 1 S.O.S 2.0 or 10, you'll find a reward level below that suits you. Remember that for us, every little bit, now matter how small, helps make the project possible. If you pledge for a PACKAGE, this means you get 1 50Kn Steel Carabiner, 1 Waterproof Cable Case, and 4, 12" Braided Nylon Aluminum Cased USB Charging cables (micro USB, Lightening, or mix at any ratio according to your preference).

 

 

Cable Case, Carabiner, Cables

 

 

Some products help you live a better life - one day, The S.O.S 2.0 might just SAVE yours. Charge multiple devices at once, replenish your portable battery using only the sun, drop/kick/splash/use/abuse, and signal for help. The S.O.S 2.0 is an explorer's best friend.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We promise to deliver on time. We know how big of a commitment it is to buy a product before it's ever manufactured on a large scale! We know you'll be waiting to get what you want for longer than you'd prefer - that's why we are committed to ensuring your product is delivered on time. Our relationships with our manufacturer is ship shape - below you'll find the schedule and timing to expect with the production of your SOS PowerBank.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Risks and Challenges are extremely limited. We now have a long standing relationship with our supplier (one year of long hard work together) as well as our shipping and expediting companies. Our packaging is designed and ready to go - really, all of our ducks are in a row! HOWEVER, as with ANY advanced manufacturing in a foreign country, there CAN be delays. This is why we have set a very conservative delivery date for all reward levels - we hope to outperform these and deliver early :)

The S.O.S 2.0 is an explorer's best friend.          We promise to deliver on time. We know how big of a commitment it is to buy a product before it's ever manufactured on a large scale! We know you'll be waiting to get what you want for longer than you'd prefer - that's why we are committed to ensuring your product is delivered on time. Our relationships with our manufacturer is ship shape - below you'll find the schedule and timing to expect with the production of your SOS PowerBank.  Risks and challengesRisks and Challenges are extremely limited. We now have a long standing relationship with our supplier (one year of long hard work together) as well as our shipping and expediting companies. Our packaging is designed and ready to go - really, all of our ducks are in a row! HOWEVER, as with ANY advanced manufacturing in a foreign country, there CAN be delays. This is why we have set a very conservative delivery date for all reward levels - we hope to outperform these and deliver early :)

story:
We decided to do this crowdfunding due to our own experiences with regards to people who suffer from some form of mental illness. People suffering from depression or are bipolar or even schizophrenia, some are not able to secure stable jobs and so forth.

As for me, I suffer from schizophrenia and anxiety. I have tried to hold down jobs after leaving the teaching profession but my anxiety has always gotten the better of me  and usually I would have to quit. This is also true for my cousin who is suffering from bipolar and depression.

Thus, due to our failed attempts to get stable good paying jobs to help support our families, my husband and I came up with this project. Another reason is because help from charities or government are rather few, even if there were, they are very difficult to apply for and get approved.

This project is intended to financially help people like my cousin and myself, also those with mental illness.

Our project is a combination of aquaponics and a mini deli kitchen. It will made to be self sustaining with its own operation power supply. Made to be able to generate it's own power to run the water pumps, water filters, aeration pumps and so forth to provide for a good aquaponics system 24/7.

A deli kitchen is included to provide food for the needy, especially those suffering from mental illness and to increase profits for the operation expenses. Any extra profits from sales will also be distributed to some patients from the Institute of Mental Health (IMH) for a start. In future, as we grow this business, we intent to try to provide for most in and out patients from IMH that are unable to provide for themselves or their family. By doing so, we hope to lighten the burdens of both the family and the patient.

To be realistic, due to the amount of patients, which we think could be large, we will work with IMH. We intend to ask IMH to provide us with a list of patients that urgently needs some form of financial assistance.

The idea of this project, is not only to grow organic healthy vegetables, fruits, herbs, fish and prawns but to also to cook with our produce. We intend to use the deli kitchen to cook up healthy and nutritious meals. Our purpose is to teach and show public the different types of vegetables and greens, cooked in various ways, without the use of artificial flavorings and seasonings. The deli kitchen is also to help reduce wastage of extra produce that have not been sold.

The amount of SGD 150,000 or USD 109,784  is a conservative starting amount,  we will for now roll the profits which we get from this small setup. However, if this crowdfunding pulls in more, we will definitely build a bigger system, to cater for more grow beds and tanks of fish and prawns.

When we have raise SGD 150,000 or USD 109,784 we will start the project immediately, and if we are able to raise SGD 300,000 or USD 219,559, we will get better equipment, more varieties of vegetables,  increase number of fishes, prawns, and more helpers for this project.

Please do help us in our cause so that we will be able to help those with mental illness. There are very few organizations that helps people who suffer from some form of mental illness. Not only that, it is also a sad fact that not many in society understand or are tolerant of people with mental illness. Some people in society are also oblivion of the severity and difficulties faced by people who suffer from mental illness.

We do also welcome those who are suffering from some sort of mental illness or families who have someone with mental illness to contact us for future assistance. Should they qualify for assistance, we will most gladly help out.

Please do help spread the word and donate to our cause, which I'm sure will be greatly appreciated by the many people who have mental health issues.

Every dollar donated counts and will go a long way.

“ Dr Seuss- Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not.”

PERKS

Starter reward are for those who have contributed $25 and they will receive 0.00125% profit share of 20% sales profits from this project once it is up and running. They will receive it every 3 months starting from Dec 2018.

Comfy reward are for those who have contributed $50 and they will receive 0.0025% profit share of the 20% sales profits from this project once it is up and running. They will receive it every 3 months starting from Dec 2018.

Contributor's reward are for those who have contributed $100 and they will receive 0.005% profit share of 20% sales profits from this project once it is up and running. They will receive it every 3 months starting from Dec 2018.

Please also note that the remainder 30% will go towards the less fortunate in Singapore and the rest will be for the expansion and sustaining of the business.

story:
Click the link below to read our

article in Solar Benefits!

http://www.solarbenefits.info/solar-panels-made-from-recycled-tires/
 

      

Our modules are 100% Made and manufactured in the US with scrap tires from US!

 

Our Homepage as well:

https://treadergy.com/

 

Our YouTube home page :

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBWTeH9gJodqP6vwwDd9fow

 

Treadergy IUC has spent a lot of time and energy thinking about this planet.  We have come up with a solar thermal building block that captures heat from the sun.  Typical fluids that are circulated though a series of these panels can reach temperatures of up to 160 Degrees Farehheit depending on conditions and exposure.  What you do with this energy is up to you.   

Treadergy is an Independent Unregistered Church that fosters education and employment of simple technology to offset individuals energy footprint. Our divine belief and mission is to help clean this planet for all of God's Children.

Each individual has different parameters to meet their daily existence.   By using available energy to minimize grid consumption, our carbon dependence will wither away over the years leaving us with a cleaner environment for our future generations.

For many years the powers that be have made it increasingly difficult to employ alternative energy in a way that that can't be controlled by the establishment.  Treadergy doesn't want to participate in their "games" of tax credits, grid connection and other monopolies.  We are donating our cutting edge recycled technology to our members as an educational toy.  We have decided to make up our own game, we hope that you will want to play with us.  The rules are simple, use a building block to make energy.

All who wish to play this game will be required to acknowledge this page as a waiver to donate the equivalent amount of suggested federal reserve notes to attain these modules.  The age of rampant lawsuits combined with the lack of common sense are putting us in this position.  These modules come with absolutely no warranty, guarantee or performance parameters.  What we can tell you is that they make hot water, glycol and air.  They are rendered "as is" and do not qualify for any kind of local, state or federal tax credit.   The great part about these modules is that you can easily attain them without the incentives.  Your donation is not eligible for any tax deductions as we are an Independent Unregistered Church, however it will be reciprocated with an equal donation of module toy(s) that you want for educational purposes.   For us to wait years and spend millions of dollars to gain their approval and charge you more is not in the cards.  Your approval is what we really want.  By donating the equivalent of federal reserve notes to attain these educational units, you are holding Treadergy Independent Unregistered Church harmless from any type of legal or lawful action anywhere on the planet Earth.  No claims, representations or warranties, whether expressed or implied, are made by our Church and it's Members, as to the safety , reliability, durability and  performance of our toys.  Furthermore, we accept no liability whatsoever for the safety, reliability, durability and performance of any of our toys.   You are also investing in our mission to reach others like you, to help make a difference.  In no event shall our Church or it's Members be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental , special consequential damages, to property or life, whatsoever arising out of or connected with the use or misuse of our toys.  The assumption of risk is placed squarely on the party that is playing with these toys.   You are also agreeing that you are over the age of 18 and are are of mental capacity to make such an agreement.  Do not blend these with other systems without due diligence!  You are solely responsible for the use or misuse of this educational toy once it is in your possession.  Jurisdiction lies inherently, exclusively and expressly  from, within, and between God, our Church, and its Members. So there are the caveats, but if you are reading this, you know you are looking for an advantage to the game.  These  work on simple principles and will surpass your expectations.  Be a player making strides to beat Fat Cat Utility at his own game.  Through our collective information, tenacity and imagination, we will all win together!

 

By donating to this campaign and authorizing your transfer of equivalent federal reserve notes, you affirm, agree and consent that you have read and understand the previous paragraph.

story:
What is Grow IQ?

Grow IQ is a smart and simple solution that allows indoor growers to spend minimal effort on growing plants while still maintaining high yields.

It is a modern horticulture LED light with smartphone app connectivity and control, scheduling, and monitoring; providing the first step in grow light automation. Growers will be able to use the mobile app to connect directly to the light. This allows control of the lights wirelessly while staying discreet on growing activity. Grow IQ also offers a proprietary scheduling method to help automate and simplify the growing process.

Even today’s advanced LED grow lights are still very basic in design and have to be managed manually, or with the use of an external device. Growers often have to either time the lighting cycle themselves (risky and time consuming) or rely on bulky and outdated timers to manage the light cycles. Controlling the lights is also manual with physical buttons/switches which may not always be easily accessible.

Grow IQ's advanced features address all these limitations while offering unique advantages that optimize the growing process and provide the grower with a peace of mind.

 

Features

 

Effective and efficient: Grow IQ lights are designed to be suitable for both Chlorophyll A and B phases, and are safe to use during any stage of the plant’s growing cycle. Energy consumption is highly efficient and can save up to 75% of electricity compared to traditional lighting methods such as HPS.

Plant progress using the G100 light during actual testing.

Smart: Grow IQ's  proprietary scheduling method offers a seamless workflow and will reduce a substantial amount of stress and effort in managing the light cycles for any stage of growth. The Grow IQ mobile app maintains private connection to the light and keeps the  grow light network stay discrete. Features of the light are fully configurable using the app and firmware upgrades can be done over the air. 

Stable and transparent: Our mobile app works with standard Wi-Fi protocol to assure compatibility and stability on different platforms, including iOS and Android. The connection to the box is extremely fast and reliable. You simply need to install the app, connect, and then control the light.

Safe: The Grow IQ light is featured with a temperature monitoring sensor to prevent hazards in case of a malfunctioning system, or unexpected environmental changes. The system continuously monitors interior temperature, and will carry out an emergency power cutoff when it reaches an abnormal operating temperature. The grower can also always check the ambient temperature inside the light box wirelessly via the app.

Dynamic: Every Grow IQ light can be linked to each other to form a network of lights that will be synchronized. This reduces the effort involved in managing multiple lights and ensuring they run exactly the same schedule. Grow IQ owners can also plug their legacy grow lights into the Grow IQ system, and it will handle the scheduling in synchrony. The scheduling system of the Grow IQ light was also designed to be power-outage sustainable; which means the schedule configuration will remain on time and counting in the event of a power outage. 

Convenience: A gardener may be managing several independent grow rooms or tents at once, and each garden may be running a unique lighting schedule. Using the Grow IQ system, the gardener will not have to remember the schedule for each room or keep updated records of the running schedule for each. The gardener can avoid physical entering the garden in order to check the light status, and therefore will also avoid unwanted light pollution during dark periods that can jeopardize the crop. 

Slick and eco-friendly: The housing of the light is made of exotic solid wood, which was individually selected by our engineers. It is CNC precision cut, milled, and laser etched to ensure proper form and fit. The boxes are then hand finished, sealed, and polished to protect and display the natural grain of the wooden panels. The brushed Aluminum top and bottom covers further accentuate the natural look of the finished solid wood boxes.

Specs

 

  • Power: true 50W (G100), 100W (G200, G200L)
  • Light source: COB LED
  • LEDs: 32 (G100), 64 (G200, G200L)
  • LED Type (true wattage): 1.5W High Power 
  • LED brands: Bridgelux, Epileds
  • Wavelengths: 
  • Growth stages: Vegetative & Flower
  • Chlorophyll support: A & B
  • Voltage range: 100 - 240 VAC
  • Operating Temperature: < 165°F
  • Housing material: White oak (G100), Walnut (G200, G200L)
  • Controller: Wireless using mobile app (iOS and Android)
  • Daisy chain: Yes
  • Max daisy chain: 8 (G100), 4 (G200, G200L) (*)
  • Dimensions: 8”x8”x3.5”
  • Weight: 5 lbs (G100), 5.5 lbs (G200, G200L)
  • PAR (µmol/m2/s):


The Grow IQ App

 

Grow 101

Plants normally grow under sunlight. There are situations, however, where plants need artificial light to grow and thrive properly. For example, in the winter daylight can be too short or the temperature can be too cold for the plants to grow outdoors. Such situations require supplemental light to allow plants to grow indoor year round. Artificial light from a light source used with the intent of inducing photosynthesis within plants by simulating sunlight is often referred to as a grow light.

Grow lights have improved over time, with the latest push being more towards modern high output Light Emitting Diodes (LED). LEDs in general received a wide acceptance at the turn of the century due to their efficiency, lifespan, and the flexibility they offer in the design of a light source. An LED grow light can be custom designed to produce a light spectrum similar to the sun or can be optimized to match specific needs of a particular plant. LED grow lights offer the grower the convenience and the flexibility to grow plants of choice year round in a controlled environment, while offering maximum discretion.

While grow lights have evolved, and modern LEDs have become the light source of choice for most growers, little has been done in the area of automation and remote monitoring at the consumer level grow light.

Made in USA

Grow IQ is designed and made in the USA. The team developed and tested the circuit boards, firmware, housing, and mobile apps using our in house resources and manufacturing partners right here in the United States of America!

 

About Us 

Grow IQ initially formed between former coworkers who saw a smarter future powered by evolving technology and the adoption of smart mobile devices. As the group was completing development on one of the prototypes, they saw an immediate application for its technology in the emerging horticulture industry. The team then focused all resources to implement the technology into a smarter grow light, and Grow IQ was born.

The project started in mid-2015. Today, our Grow IQ lights have been completely developed and tested, and we are ready to make them available to the market.

Robert is the Grow IQ’s electronics designer. He has experience in schematic capture and board design and layout. He works on development of high temperature downhole electronics for the oil and gas industry and has multiple patent applications pending for downhole tools. Robert’s hobbies include 3D printing, woodworking, bicycling, and building desktop computers. His passion has always been for solving problems and taking apart and fixing anything that is broken. Besides his formal education and professional experience, Robert also enjoys being an amateur mechanic, plumber, and handyman in his daily life.

Tung is the system architect and the firmware/software engineer of Grow IQ. At work, he specializes in developing a wide range of complex industrial software from modeling and simulation to system diagnostics and analysis. At home, he enjoys being behind a computer and workbench burning the midnight oil; developing automation systems, cloud-based applications, and smart devices such as the one featured here. Tung is a jack of all trades and a DIY kind of guy. He is also a globe-trotter and a travel photographer. He has backpacked to more than 20 countries and taken thousands of photos worldwide.

Vadim is the mechanical/industrial engineer on the team. Before leaving corporate in 2014 to become a self-employed consultant, Vadim worked on and managed a wide range of R&D development projects for major companies, including a Fortune 500 in the oil & gas industry. Vadim specialized in structural integrity of complex electromechanical systems subjected to extreme temperatures, pressures, shock and vibration. His industry contributions are documented in 5 patents and several publications. Vadim's hobbies have always been fixing, designing, and building things. In his spare time he enjoys day-trading, running, and spending time with his dog Bella. He shares a vision with the team of a future where smart devices are an essential component of our daily lives.

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have had a lot of time since we began working on the project to overcome the technical and manufacturing challenges and we have put a lot of planning into the campaign to minimize the risk in delivering these boxes to the customer.

Our team while talented is small, so we limited the campaign funds only to acquire equipment for low volume production, and are limiting the offerings of each unit to meet the campaign commitment. Since we are small, Grow IQ also has to rely on our vendors and suppliers to deliver the parts and components needed to build these boxes.

We have gone through great length in making sure our suppliers are reliable and have second sourced all critical components. We have also done quite a bit of work in the design to keep it simple and minimized the volume and delivery risk with all of our vendors.

Grow IQ was built on open communication and different ideas coming together. We have carried this philosophy in building great relationships with our partners and vendors and will communicate openly with our customers about our successes and failures along the way. The team is ready!

Contact Us

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions and also follow us on Facebook and Instagram for latest updates.

    

Email: info@growiq.co

Website: growiq.co

An LED grow light can be custom designed to produce a light spectrum similar to the sun or can be optimized to match specific needs of a particular plant. LED grow lights offer the grower the convenience and the flexibility to grow plants of choice year round in a controlled environment, while offering maximum discretion.
While grow lights have evolved, and modern LEDs have become the light source of choice for most growers, little has been done in the area of automation and remote monitoring at the consumer level grow light.
Made in USA
Grow IQ is designed and made in the USA. The team developed and tested the circuit boards, firmware, housing, and mobile apps using our in house resources and manufacturing partners right here in the United States of America!


 
About Us 
Grow IQ initially formed between former coworkers who saw a smarter future powered by evolving technology and the adoption of smart mobile devices. As the group was completing development on one of the prototypes, they saw an immediate application for its technology in the emerging horticulture industry. The team then focused all resources to implement the technology into a smarter grow light, and Grow IQ was born.
The project started in mid-2015. Today, our Grow IQ lights have been completely developed and tested, and we are ready to make them available to the market.



Robert is the Grow IQ’s electronics designer. He has experience in schematic capture and board design and layout. He works on development of high temperature downhole electronics for the oil and gas industry and has multiple patent applications pending for downhole tools. Robert’s hobbies include 3D printing, woodworking, bicycling, and building desktop computers. His passion has always been for solving problems and taking apart and fixing anything that is broken. Besides his formal education and professional experience, Robert also enjoys being an amateur mechanic, plumber, and handyman in his daily life.



Tung is the system architect and the firmware/software engineer of Grow IQ. At work, he specializes in developing a wide range of complex industrial software from modeling and simulation to system diagnostics and analysis. At home, he enjoys being behind a computer and workbench burning the midnight oil; developing automation systems, cloud-based applications, and smart devices such as the one featured here. Tung is a jack of all trades and a DIY kind of guy. He is also a globe-trotter and a travel photographer. He has backpacked to more than 20 countries and taken thousands of photos worldwide.



Vadim is the mechanical/industrial engineer on the team. Before leaving corporate in 2014 to become a self-employed consultant, Vadim worked on and managed a wide range of R&D development projects for major companies, including a Fortune 500 in the oil & gas industry. Vadim specialized in structural integrity of complex electromechanical systems subjected to extreme temperatures, pressures, shock and vibration. His industry contributions are documented in 5 patents and several publications. Vadim's hobbies have always been fixing, designing, and building things. In his spare time he enjoys day-trading, running, and spending time with his dog Bella. He shares a vision with the team of a future where smart devices are an essential component of our daily lives.


 

 

 
Risks & Challenges

We have had a lot of time since we began working on the project to overcome the technical and manufacturing challenges and we have put a lot of planning into the campaign to minimize the risk in delivering these boxes to the customer.
Our team while talented is small, so we limited the campaign funds only to acquire equipment for low volume production, and are limiting the offerings of each unit to meet the campaign commitment. Since we are small, Grow IQ also has to rely on our vendors and suppliers to deliver the parts and components needed to build these boxes.
We have gone through great length in making sure our suppliers are reliable and have second sourced all critical components. We have also done quite a bit of work in the design to keep it simple and minimized the volume and delivery risk with all of our vendors.
Grow IQ was built on open communication and different ideas coming together. We have carried this philosophy in building great relationships with our partners and vendors and will communicate openly with our customers about our successes and failures along the way. The team is ready!

Contact Us

Feel free to contact us if you have any questions and also follow us on Facebook and Instagram for latest updates.
    
Email: info@growiq.co
Website: growiq.co

story:
Short Summary
Meet Michael Bell, a man who served his country for years and who also gathered 25 years of experience in the working field. Michael has several degrees, but we’ll mention the most important ones. Michael Bell is a proud single dad who tries to learn all his family the great values of life. His passion in this field led him to start producing this amazing device which has the goal to help anyone out there. We all know that electricity will always be a part of our lives, so having a helpful device which will keep us safe is something that anyone should have. 

  • AA - Political Science / Pre Law Business
  • Earn licenses in both Real Estate / Mortgage Broker 
  • Background in Real Estate Construction

If you wonder why you should make a contribution to this device, you have to ask yourself this: „Why do I contribute every day supporting big brands?” Each and every day you go out, every cent you spent on things you don’t really need is a contribution to big brands and corporations that took the control of our lives. Well, why not contribute to the creation of a safety device which will make contractors and simple people work safer with electricity? Michael spent a lot of time and thanks to his passion he was able to create the 220 JL device designated to make things easier and safer when it comes to electricity. 

What We Need & What You Get

•    We need $20,000
•    Michael is willing to mention you as one of the founders who helped him create and retail this device
•    The funds will be administered by Michael. He is the founder and the inventor of this device and he will put his team to work with this money 
The Impact
The device can be a lifesaver if you have it and use it each time you want to test voltage. You can also balance the load to equal so you can prevent accidents like overloading
•    This great device helps the contractor understand how much power is being pulled by the equipment inside a building to determine if they installed the correct meter box or breaker panel to handle a load of electric on demand.
•    Laser cut brackets made of C101 (oxygen free copper) rated for 200 amp 600v with a coated non conductive handle which makes it easy be handled by almost anyone.

Risks & Challenges
Actually, there is no risk in creating this device and put it on the market. Michael is sure that in no time this product will be understood by people around the world and it will become a must-have device. But the support he is seeking is a real challenge. It’s his first time trying to find investors and he does this because, with support, things will move much faster.
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Michael accepts any support he can get. If you think you can help Michael with something else than money, you are welcome to share your thoughts. 
•    If you trust this device, but somehow you can’t support this idea with money, you can help us by promoting it on your website or on your social media.
•    Use the IndieGoGo share tools and it will be much easier for everyone to see our product.

story:
About Monty

 

Monty bags are used to get rid of any unpleasant smells that have accumulated during everyday course of life. They are filled with the mineral which naturally absorbs the moisture and odours. There are no added flavourings that are often used by other odour removing products which simply mask off the unpleasant smell.  Monty bags' essential advantage is its compact size which makes it easy to use in your daily life: when your shoes get wet; or you want to remove unwanted smell from your sport equipment or even a fridge. Last but not least, Monty bag is reusable as you can simply dry it for a couple of hours once in a while and it will regain back all of its properties.

 

Features

 

How and where to use Monty: 

 

Any shoes (sports, everyday use, children's, .....)

 

Any high intensity sports equipment

 

Alternative use cases are:

  • Smoking areas;
  • Cars;
  • Wardrobes;
  • Refrigerators;

Monty has a wide range of applications. This product is not focused on any particular segment of consumers. Almost everyone can use Monty bags in everyday life. Feel dampness in the bag where the wet swimsuit was left after a trip to the sea? Or there is a musty smell from the box with stuff stored in the attic? Wet children shoes after running around in puddles? Each of these problems for both kids and adults can be solved with the help of Monty.

 

About zeolite

The history of the zeolites study began more than 300 years ago when scientists found first non-industrial scale accumulations of this mineral. The discovery of zeolites did not arouse strong interest due to the lack of applied value and they were forgotten for the next 200 years. Until in the mid-20th century, scientists faced the problem of water purification. Only then it became clear that zeolite is one the most valuable minerals in the industry. Today zeolites are often used in different aspects of everyday life from water purification to increasing productivity of agricultural crops by acting as a carrier of nutrients; and even being used as an eco-friendly alternative to phosphates in washing powders.

Today, natural zeolite has reached truly industrial scale and rightfully claims to be one of the most useful and sought-after minerals mined by natural means. An important advantage of the mineral over other absorbents is that it not only filters the water, but it also removes free radicals from it which negatively affect the state of healthy body cells.

In modern industry zeolites are indispensable in eliminating the effects of ecological disasters such as an oil spill. Due to their ion exchange properties minerals absorb a thin oil film and hold it in their structure like in a storage compartment.

A little extra scientific details for the curios ones

Zeolite belongs to a group of microporous minerals also referred to as “molecular sieves”. These microporous solids are able to create so called “sieves” to filter out selected compounds based on their size thanks to zeolites’ consistent pore structure.

Zeolites are well known for its ion exchange property and being naturally stacked with negative charge particles. Due to the just mentioned characteristics as well as their porous structures, zeolites are great at adsorbing, absorbing and containing the different types of gases, odours and ions.  This means that zeolites have an ability to attract and capture unwanted molecules and replace them with desired particles. Zeolite based water softeners work by exploiting this feature.

The formation process of zeolite plays an important role in understanding its ion exchange property. Natural zeolites were created when melted lava interacted with the sea water, this way zeolite was loaded with sodium ions. This process is known as ion exchange. Sodium ions acquired during the process of formation can be replaced by other ions present in particular solution.

Did you know?

According to computer predictions there could be millions of potential zeolite structures.Scientists so far discovered and synthesised only 232 of these structures which leaves a big question why we observe only insignificant selection of all possible structures.

 

Alternatives comparison

Home remedies: not convenient in use, their preparation is time-consuming; may lead to spoilage of things.

Charcoal: is not for multiuse unlike Monty; it loses its properties after each use, and it creates a perfect environment for bacteria and mould to grow

Deodorisers:  not an environmentally friendly and healthy product due to the large number of chemicals in its composition. In addition, they are not safe to use due to the presence of easily flammable components.

Pods:  short-term use; do not have antibacterial effect; often contain chemical components.

 

Story

Once a group of chemistry and biology students decided to arrange a week-long trip to the countryside staying in tents.  They found a wonderful place for camping, set up their tents and had long night talks by the fire. The night was warm and so were the conversations. As it was getting very late and everyone was exhausted after the earlier hike in the woods; students decided to wrap it up for the night and went to sleep leaving most of their hiking stuff outside. What nobody expected was the rain that took everyone by surprise and students found some of their belongings soaking wet the next morning.  By this time students were quite far from their home and this long-awaited trip was in jeopardy. Fortunately, one of the chemistry students had some mineral samples with him as he was using them as catalysts in his research. He knew that mineral possessed some adsorbent features and he decided it wouldn’t hurt to test its potential absorbing properties and put them inside the wet hiking shoes. While driving to the new place, the damp and unpleasant smell was eliminated. This student became a hero of that day.

After that successful experiment a great deal of work was done to create the optimal mineral combination and suitable packaging for this product. We are eager to help you solve these unpleasant everyday troubles and make your day a little less stressful and odourless.

In order to maximize the range of Monty's actions, we have perceived every person from our circle of friends as an expert who could help us improve the product by telling us about cases such as stench from guinea pig cage; dampness in a suitcase where a wet umbrella was mistakenly put; or just a smell from the boxing gloves that they were afraid to bring  home after an active workout in the gym.


 

Risks & Challenges

We are very exited to launch this project. We have been obsessing about Monty for a wile now so we had time to think about any potential problems that might occur. We are eager to start manufacturing immediately after the campaign and ship all the products in 2020. The only issue that still stands is a slight possibility of a delivery delay due to Covid-19. This is something that's hard to foresee, but we will do our very best to overcome any obstacles.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
The human population is shown to increase to 8.6 billion by the mid 2030's.
Our population is growing at an exponential rate raising the question: What are we going to do with our resources?
The inevitable increase in human population will bring one main problem and that is fresh water.
Fresh water is a resource for the sustainability of our future generations.

Fresh water is not only needed  for drinking but also for our crops.
As the years go on it will prove more and more difficult to justify the use of our freshwater for crops.
This is controversial to the fact that there are many human beings suffering from hunger.
These number will most likely increase as our population increases.

We are senior design group 16 bringing you a solution to the water demands of the future.
we are designing a system to help solve the issue with watering the crops of tomorrow.
Our dehumidifying system will not only satisfy the needs of watering crops but can also be used for any fresh water implementation that will be needed for our future generations. 

Our system comprising of a micro controller, GUI interface, PH sensor, and full large scale industrial dehumidifier connected to an irrigation system will surely be the answer of the future.
Primarily made to be implemented in humid areas, this will offer the simplest and easiest real world approach to gathering fresh clean water and distributing it among any crops.

We are asking you to back us in our unique approach to solving the issues we have presented.
Don't stand by and let your children solve these issues... when you can act now!
We ask you to help support Senior design group 16 in solving the issues of the future.
This system will be a great way to help save the human race from water deficiencies.
The world is becoming more and more competitive for human resources and we are visualizing a world where these resources can be gathered in a technologically advanced way.

What We Need & What You Get

We only ask for a mere 5 dollar contribution out of as many people as possible. Feel free to donate more to the cause. This project will be put together in conjunction with a smart farm system to test its effectiveness. Any like minded environmentally friendly individuals are asked to please contribute in solving the issues of sustainability for the future. 

We will be hand writing a "Fresh Clean Water" postcard for any individuals that do end up donating. This will be signed off by the team and even though it will take some time from us, it will show our love and thanks to those that support us. 

The Impact

The impact this will make is tremendous. The issue were having now is that fresh water is more and more scarce due to the exponential growth of the human population. We will be solving one of the biggest issues of the future now in the present. Don't stand by and let your kids fix these issues when we can solve them now.

Risks & Challenges

The challenges we will be going through is ultimately implementing this on a large scale. We have a smaller scale test model smart farm to hook it up to and test its effectiveness.

Other Ways You Can Help

Let other environmentally conscious individuals know what senior design group 16 is doing TODAY!!!

story:
General adapters have any questions

You need eLUGGAGE X-max

The First Universal Adapter support PD 45W of the world

Fit for more than 150 countries

Using AC100-250V wide voltage input to break through voltage limitation and high frequency wave output to meet different countries travel charging demand. Maximum power:100V-1000W/250V-2500W

Plug standards applicable to all countries. Almost all electronic devices can be connected by interfaces.

Detachable design For special countries.Perfect support for normal standards such as Korea and Germany

Various jacks integrated functions

eLUGGAGE X-max is a perfect travel partner for you need

With 3 USB ports

With 2USB 2.0ports and 1USB C port, it can charge 4 devices simultaneously

3-pins Ground Connection

Compraing

Use anywhere

Many travelers will carry their own charging standard appliances from different countries.The charging sockets are requiring high power switching, so travellers’devices cannot be directly used by the hotel’s sockets. eLUGGAGE X-max could solve this problem automatically with its switching charger system

Fast charging

Charging 55% takes only 30 minutes

Special for USB-C Products

Could be used for the latest USB-C interface high power input laptops.USB-C port is capable of 45W power delivery, it is also compatible with QC quick charging 18W power delivery quick charging, you will never be worried about the endurance

Push-button fuse reset 


eLUGGAGE X-max  is built with a reset button.Similar to the household electric switch, it will be disconnected for self-protection if the power or current exceeds the upper limit. After production, press the reset button to resume use.Push-button fuse reset 

Multiple protection security guarantee

Fire prevention

eLUGGAGAE X-max is made with outstanding. Made of fine copper nickel plating, durable conductive pin and using the highest fire insulation for high temperature protected & pressure, drop resistant shell material

Children safety Protector

The jack is provided with anti-electric shock separator, and the children safety protector is adapted for protecting the children from electric shock.

Price

International Security Certification

eLUGGAGE X-max has passed the safety certifications including CE, BS8546, RoHS, FCC and provides the safe, stable and durable travel charging socket for using in different countries

The production is ready, we just need your support!

story:
Save our (marine) Wildlife

We are two Dutchmen, we are good friends and both live over 10 years in southern Spain. A stone throw away from the Mediterranean sea where we always loved to dive. Unfortunately we see more and more plastic waste in our seas. Did you know that more than 8 million tons of plastic are dumped into our seas every year? That is roughly 1 truck load every minute.

This has to stop!

With the help of some engineering friends we developed a new packaging material made out of recycled paper, reinforced with bio fibers. This packaging falls apart in 24-30 hours when fully submerged and can even be safely eaten by wildlife.

We are not here to make any profit, as soon as our product is fully ready, companies can use our formula free of charge.

We need your help to protect our Seas for all the animals for who the sea is their home, but also for ourselves and our children.

 

 

What We Need & What You'll Get

Our prototype is ready, but we need $ 25,000.- to make it ready for mass production and to raise awareness of these plastic hazards for wildlife.

We need additional tests to proof breweries our product is strong enough to withstand a range of temperatures including storage, transportation and refrigeration at home.

You can support us by simply donating, or by buying one of the products we offer, please have a look at the perks.

If we do not reach our goal, the funds will be used to raise awareness of these hazards for wildlife.

 

Plastic six pack rings alternative

Plastic six pack rings may seem harmless and they are great to pack your favorite cans of beer, but they are literally killing wildlife. Not only marine life like dolphins, turtles and fishes, but also millions of birds die every year by eating plastic waste, or they get strangled in it.

Our new packaging materials are made out of recycled paper, reinforced with bio fibers that are a remnant of the food industry, and otherwise would have been thrown away. 

Our first samples learned us that holding the liquid filled can is not the biggest problem. The tray cannot be floppy, it has to be solid, so it doesn’t break if you take it out of the fridge. We were testing different sorts of paper, it has to be resistant to the humidity in the fridge, yet dissolve once in nature and off course we wanted to use recycled paper.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest concern is of course  the breweries and their packaging machines. These (expensive) machines  are built to last many years. How can we persuade these companies to change their packaging materials?

To start with, we will focus on the successful micro breweries, who have small machines that are easy to convert. As soon as this is successful, we can show the major breweries that our solution works and that their customers want it.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Short on cash? Help us by joining our website, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.  Help us to create awareness and save the wildlife in our precious seas. The more you share, the more we can convince companies to use more plastic alternatives.

You can always use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Besides helping us online, we strongly encourage you to join ocean cleanup teams in your area.

story:
MAKE WASTE NOT WASTE

If you enjoy cooking,  then you produce an abundance of food scraps every time you’re in the kitchen!

Now, no more smelly,throwing food scraps away to rot in landfills.

Medior turns your organic waste into compost with only one button in 4 hours.

                 

 

 

 

Don’t waste your waste

 

As we all know , many household waste have no way to dispose of food scrapes in a clean and sustainable way.

This is a global problem.

World Bank Report stresses that solid waste management is critical for sustainable,  healthy, and inclusive cities and communities,  yet it is often overlooked,  particularly in low-income countries.   While more than one-third of waste in high-income countries is recovered through recycling and composting,  only 4 percent of waste in low-income countries is recycled.

Medior was founded a way to solve this problem that units natural composting and technology to turns your organic waste into compost.

 

Say goodbye to garbage!

Do you have any trouble in disposing waste?

 

We take care of all of your organic waste

Our shredding system can deal with almost everything,  even small bones.

 

Just one button , turns your waste into compost

We wanted to create a device to transform your waste convenient, fast and high efficiency.

We also refer to other products,  other products create fertilizer --- by just dry heat and grind up waste or use biochemical enzymes decompose waste, maybe it will take a month , and you must look after them twice or three times a week.

Medior have gone through several years of under scientific research and created a fully automatic technology and innovative.

Only one button and 4 hours later you can get real compost.

It will lead to a volume reduction of 50%-80%. Different foods may cause different volume reductions, such as vegetables such as cabbage will be reduced by 80%, but meat or seafood will be 50%.

Medior combined  humidity and temperature wakes up the microorganisms and accelerates them metabolism.

Medior reduces composting time from one month to only 4 hours.     

                                                                                                

How do Medior work?

 

 

 

The Advantages of Medior

Medior transforms the majority of compounds in your food scraps like sugar,  starch,  and proteins.  These are broken down within 4h to fresh compost.

Food waste dryers do only one thing:  shredding and drying food.  There is no biological decomposition process involved.

 You can see the graph blow about compared with other products.

 

Organic waste in the world

A World bank report projects that the amount of solid waste we generate on earth will double by the year 2025.  If current trends continue,  we are likely to go from 3.5 million tons to 6 million tons per day by that point.

If that’s not bad enough,  the figures predict that trash production will only keep growing for the foreseeable future.  It predicts we won’t hit peak garbage – global trash production at its highest and then leveling off – until sometime after 2100.  At that point, we will be producing 11 million tons of trash per day．

Maybe you think our earth is the left one  that we have  bule sky, clean land, air, water ,  and also abundant natural resources,  but the truth is right one . Lots of garbage is created. Where there are people, there will be always waste.

We have to think about what would it take to stop the garbage problem?

Many local communities in the U.S.  have started to make residents pay for trash collection.  This does force people to find more creative solutions to divert trash that doesn’t have to end up in a landfill,  like  composting in their backyards.

 Facts About Landfills

Americans throw out almost 40% of their food in landfills.

One Arizona landfill study found,  among other things,  “still-recognizable 25-year-old hot dogs,  corncobs and grapes in landfills.

This is the equivalent of 20 lbs of food,  per person,  per month Or $165 Billion per year.

Benefits of Composting

By contrast,  if you turn your waste into compost,  you will:

Give your plants macro and micronutrients they may be missing from soil that has become depleted.

Help the soil itself absorb and hold water and nutrients.

Feed a variety of earthworms, beetles,  ants and other bugs,  which do amazing things for the soil and in turn bring a host of micronutrients back to your own table,  if you’re growing your own vegetables.

Improve the PH balance of the soil.

Add beneficial bacteria and fungi to the soil.

Treating organic waste also reduces waste disposal costs,  and leads to cleaner recyclables,  as well as avoiding greenhouse gas emissions.  As waste management is usually within the power of cities,  cities can often implement food and organics waste schemes quickly.

 

What is included with Medior?

                           

 We ship many locations,  we will provide a  plug what you need.  You can check the graph blow and tell us which type do you need.

 

Details

 

USE COMPOST IN MANY WAYS

Give your plants or vegetables a green booster.

 

Timeline

 

Production tooling

Our manufacturing tooling is ready and we our own factory.

We have did test production in 2020 and we have a lot of experience on our factory.

We will delivery in June, 2021.

 

Where we ship  

We ship so many locations,  please check the postage blow.

 

Meet the team 

The environment around us is not only our home but everything that keeps us alive.  From the food we eat,  the water we drink,  the air we breathe,  our shelter and more,  it helps us to survive. Therefore, caring for the environment is something that should be inherent in us.

So, we think Medior can deal with or daily  kitchen waste. Turn waste into a valuable resource.

We believe that we can make something change . Revolutionize the way we handle with waste while giving back to the earth.

story:
The problem / Le Problème

[EN] - Hot water costs a lot of energy to heat, yet most of that heat goes down the drain...

Think of it: when you're having a shower, you pay to heat the water, it runs for a second on your body and as it goes down the drain, it's still hot! For showers alone, that’s a $30 B waste every year in Europe and North America. 

[FR] - Chauffer de l'eau consomme énormément d'énergie, pourtant cette chaleur finit aux égouts...

Pensez-y : quand vous êtes sous la douche, vous payez pour chauffer de l'eau, elle coule quelques secondes sur votre corps et quand elle part aux égouts, elle est encore chaude ! Rien que pour les douches, c'est 30 milliards d'euros qui partent ainsi aux égouts chaque année en Europe et en Amérique du Nord.

 

Recover that heat / Récupérez cette chaleur !

[EN] As engineers, we committed to finding a solution. It took us 8 years coming up with ever-improving products and finally, we developed Obox mini. It recovers 65% of that heat back and uses it to preheat the cold water that feeds the water heater.

For the cost of a classic water heater, you get 2/3 of your hot water for free forever! 

[FR] En tant qu'ingénieurs, nous étions décidés à trouver une solution. Après 8 ans  de produits chaque fois améliorés, nous avons finalement mis au point Obox mini. Il récupère 65% de la chaleur et l'utilise pour préchauffer l'eau froide qui alimente le chauffe-eau.

Pour le prix d'un chauffe-eau classique, vous avez 2/3 de votre eau chaude gratuite à vie !

 

Highly efficient & self-cleaning / Haute puissance et auto-nettoyant

[EN] Focusing on delivering a highly efficient system, we built Obox mini with a stainless steel plate heat exchanger that can extract 12kW out of your shower waste water!

But we did not stop there: it is critical to us that that 65% efficiency stays the same year after year. So we developed and patented an automated backflush cleaning that flushes out hairs, sand, fat, soap... It relies on a special nozzle that eliminates the need for additional valves.

We have proved its efficiency, its sturdiness. You can help us make build an assembly line to get the right quality and the right price. You can help us reaching mass production and put this 12kW beast on the market!

[FR] Déterminés à créer un système très performant, nous avons construit Obox autour d'un échangeur à plaques en acier inoxydable qui peut extraire 12 kW de chaleur des eaux usées de votre douche !

Mais nous ne sommes pas arrêtés là : il est critique pour nous que cette efficacité (65% !) soit la même d'année en année. Alors nous avons développé et breveté une purge automatique qui dégage les cheveux, le sable, le savon, les graisses... Elle repose sur une buse spéciale qui nous permet de ne pas recourir à des électrovannes supplémentaires.

Nous avons prouvé son efficacité et sa robustesse. Vous pouvez nous aider à construire une chaine d'assemblage pour atteindre la bonne qualité et le bon prix. Vous pouvez nous aider à mettre ce petit monstre de 12kW sur le marché !

What We Need & What You Get / Pour nous et pour vous

[EN] For the Obox mini to reach the market, we need:

  • €6K to develop a custom backflush controller
  • €4K to develop custom shipping carton and padding
  • €3K to have our patented backflush nozzle mass produced -- sample CNC is quite expensive! ;-)
  • €5K to set up an assembly line with fast water tightness tests

You can help us industrialize Obox mini now, and at the same time get the first units at a stunning price! Go see our perks and find your way to make this happen.

[FR] Pour mettre Obox mini sur le marché, nous avons besoin de:

  • 6 k€ pour développer un contrôleur de purge propriétaire
  • 4 k€ pour développer et faire fabriquer un emballage et un calage sur mesure
  • 3 k€ pour faire fabriquer en masse notre buse de purge brevetée -- l'usinage CNC en petite quantité coûte très cher ! ;-)
  • 5 k€ pour mettre en place une ligne de production avec un test rapide d'étanchéité

Vous pouvez nous aider à industrialiser Obox mini maintenant et obtenir un des premiers modèles à un prix incroyable ! Allez jeter un oeil sur nos contreparties pour trouver votre façon de faire décoller ce projet.

 

Risks & Challenges / Risques et défis

[EN] Industrialization is never a straightforward work and it often uncovers additional issues to be fixed. We expect to encounter some of those along the way but we've solved so many to get where we are now (we have 7 patents!) that we are confident we will deliver a robust, bulletproof heat recovery system.

We are excited to have you following our progress on Indiegogo once the project is funded!

[FR] Industrialiser un produit n'est jamais simple et ce travail met souvent à jour de nouveaux problèmes à régler. Nous nous attendons à en trouver quelques uns mais nous en avons résolu tellement pour en arriver là (nous avons 7 brevets !) que nous sommes confiants : nous allons sortir un récupérateur de chaleur indestructible.

Nous avons hâte de vous faire suivre nos progrès sur Indiegogo dès que le projet sera financé !

Nous avons hâte de vous faire suivre nos progrès sur Indiegogo dès que le projet sera financé !

story:
WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT DISPOSABLE RAZORS.. 

  • 2 billion disposable razors are thrown away in just the US every year  
  • While in the UK, 60.7 million razors and blade products are discarded annually
  • 32% of plastic ends up in the world's oceans 
  • Only 20% of the world's plastic is recycled  

Most disposable razors only last for 6-9 shaves, after which they’re blunt and destined for landfill. The average person who shaves daily or near-daily can go through some 40-50 disposable razors a year. This amounts to a staggering 2400 razors or more over a lifetime of shaving. 

Disposable razors are usually made of several different materials, which make them a challenge to recycle properly or if at all. 

Because disposable razors are made with both plastic and metal, which are hard to separate, they are difficult and costly to recycle. In contrast, our razor blades can be recycled with other metals and, if allowed to rust and break down, decompose naturally over time without leaching toxic chemicals into waterways, soil, or the air. 

INTRODUCING THE GAIZOR

 

What if there was a 'disposable' razor that you did not need to dispose of? 

A razor that could be used repeatedly without recourse to expensive replacements or cartridges. 

A razor that could perform as well as the market leaders even with repeated use. 

The GAIZOR is an innovative (patent pending) new multi-blade system processed from a single sheet of carbon steel that supersedes the embedded blade system that is the industry standard, which normally makes recycling difficult.

 

GAIZOR MEANS A NEW WAY OF DOING THINGS

GAIZOR represents a new way of doing things. No more shelling out for multiple razors and replacement cartridges. And no more guilt about contributing to environmental waste and its toxic impact. At the end of your razor's life just remove it from your GAIZOR razor and replace it with a new one.

When you buy your GAIZOR you will be invited to join our blade replacement and recycling system. As soon as you are ready to recycle a batch of blades, just place them in GAIZOR safety container and ship them back to us in the cardboard box provided.  Need new blades? Just hit us up on the GAIZOR app and we'll send out a new consignment, like yesterday.

FINANCING A REVOLUTION

We are excited to be receiving a lot of support and encouragement as we go about launching our start-up. But all the funding we receive is critical to us being able to successfully manufacture and deliver our product and keep our business and campaign going. The money we receive will be vital in securing the tooling and manufacturing capability for the GAIZOR and our razor blades.

This means sourcing and processing the recycled plastic for GAIZOR razor

Developing the tooling and moulds for each of our razor's separate components

Investing in the precise and expensive refinement of the GAIZOR blade

Helping us properly market test the GAIZOR before our launch later this year

Developing logistics for delivery to our new customers

So as you can see, there is lot to do for David to properly take on Goliath. Thank you for reading this far, and we very much hope you will choose to be part of our exciting journey. 

GAIZOR - saving the world a blade at a time 

Thank you  

The GAIZOR Team!
story_txt:
WE NEED TO TALK ABOUT DISPOSABLE RAZORS.. 

2 billion disposable razors are thrown away in just the US every year  
While in the UK, 60.7 million razors and blade products are discarded annually
32% of plastic ends up in the world's oceans 

Only 20% of the world's plastic is recycled  

Most disposable razors only last for 6-9 shaves, after which they’re blunt and destined for landfill. The average person who shaves daily or near-daily can go through some 40-50 disposable razors a year. This amounts to a staggering 2400 razors or more over a lifetime of shaving. 
Disposable razors are usually made of several different materials, which make them a challenge to recycle properly or if at all. 
Because disposable razors are made with both plastic and metal, which are hard to separate, they are difficult and costly to recycle. In contrast, our razor blades can be recycled with other metals and, if allowed to rust and break down, decompose naturally over time without leaching toxic chemicals into waterways, soil, or the air. 
INTRODUCING THE GAIZOR

 
What if there was a 'disposable' razor that you did not need to dispose of? 
A razor that could be used repeatedly without recourse to expensive replacements or cartridges. 
A razor that could perform as well as the market leaders even with repeated use. 
The GAIZOR is an innovative (patent pending) new multi-blade system processed from a single sheet of carbon steel that supersedes the embedded blade system that is the industry standard, which normally makes recycling difficult.

 
GAIZOR MEANS A NEW WAY OF DOING THINGS

GAIZOR represents a new way of doing things. No more shelling out for multiple razors and replacement cartridges. And no more guilt about contributing to environmental waste and its toxic impact. At the end of your razor's life just remove it from your GAIZOR razor and replace it with a new one.
When you buy your GAIZOR you will be invited to join our blade replacement and recycling system. As soon as you are ready to recycle a batch of blades, just place them in GAIZOR safety container and ship them back to us in the cardboard box provided.  Need new blades? Just hit us up on the GAIZOR app and we'll send out a new consignment, like yesterday.
FINANCING A REVOLUTION
We are excited to be receiving a lot of support and encouragement as we go about launching our start-up. But all the funding we receive is critical to us being able to successfully manufacture and deliver our product and keep our business and campaign going. The money we receive will be vital in securing the tooling and manufacturing capability for the GAIZOR and our razor blades.
This means sourcing and processing the recycled plastic for GAIZOR razor
Developing the tooling and moulds for each of our razor's separate components
Investing in the precise and expensive refinement of the GAIZOR blade
Helping us properly market test the GAIZOR before our launch later this year
Developing logistics for delivery to our new customers
So as you can see, there is lot to do for David to properly take on Goliath. Thank you for reading this far, and we very much hope you will choose to be part of our exciting journey. 
GAIZOR - saving the world a blade at a time 
Thank you  
The GAIZOR Team!

story:
About Us

NSP, Nordic Solar Parks, is a nonprofit organization with one mission only – to accelerate the worlds transition to sustainable energy. 100 % of the revenue generated from selling solar power, after operating costs, will go to expanding existing solar parks and establish new ones.

We are a group of engineers based in the southernmost part of Sweden. We have had enough of irresponsible corporations and countries with governments playing around with purely symbolic energy polices and who still subsidize fossil fuels. Including our own. The climate change is real and it's far worse than the most of us understand.

The relentless rise of CO2 emissions has to stop and it has to stop immediately. We are stealing our children’s future right in front of their eyes.

When the world’s leaders don’t act, someone else have to.

 

Our Mission

Our long-term goal is to be one of the biggest private solar power producers in Sweden and in the Nordic region. The short-term goal is to get the Project One up and running. Once we start delivering energy, we can expand the solar parks exponentially.

 

The Reality of Today

We have barley left 2018 behind us and it was the worst year of all time. The carbon emissions increased by 2 % and we polluted our planet with more than 45 billion metric tons of CO2, in one single year. That number was 9,2 billion tons only 60 years ago, making it an almost 500 % increase.

By using fossil fuels and dumping the CO2 in the atmosphere we are running the most dangerous experiment of all time. Planet earth and everything beautiful about it are slowly dying from the pollutions and global warming, literally. 

Hurricanes, wildfires, ice melting, islands disappearing, extreme drought, heat waves, floods, oil disasters. This is consequenses we're already suffering from. And it will get worse.  

The most powerful country in the world, USA, left the Paris agreement and president Trump even denies that the climate changes has anything to do with greenhouse gases. Chinas emissions, the world’s largest emitter, are projected to keep rising until at least 2030. This is sending all the wrong signals to the rest of the world and the big corporations. If the biggest and most powerful doesn’t do something about it, why should we…?  
It simply isn’t good enough.

 

 

What We Face

The climate and weather highly correlate with the global warming. The summers gets warmer, the winters gets colder and more servere, the hurricanes get worse and more frequent. Floods, droughts and wildfires are things we will be forced to deal with more often. The polar ice are melting and the sea level rises. Millions of people will lose their homes, starve to death and animal species will be extinguished. Our children and future generations won't have a pleasant future if this keeps going on. 

 

 

In 2014 the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) projected the sea level to rise 90 cm (2 ft) before 2099. New studies show that a global sea level rise of 200 – 270 cm (6,5 – 9 ft) is physically plausible in the same time span. Why is so few doing anything about this? Millions of people will lose their homes. Islands and cities will disappear.

 

Project One

Project One will be located in the southernmost part of Sweden. This region has the most solar irradiation and the mildest winters in the country.

The power will be sold and delivered directly to the public utility of the region. 100 % of the revenue, after operating costs like insurance, taxes etc, will be used to expand the park with new solar panels. By consistently expand the park from the revenue we can, by the compounding effect, grow exponentially. By doing this we can accelerate the transition to sustainable energy rapidly.

The Swedish government is currently planning to build two new offshore cables, “Hansa PowerBridge”, for a staggering $710 million, to import power from German coal plants to the south of Sweden. Every kWh produced by Project One will be one less kWh needed from the German coal plants.

The initial size and kW of the park depends on how much funds we will be able to get. In addition to the donations we are seeking we will apply for investment support from the Swedish government. If we receive the support, they will pay 15 %, at most $135.000, of the park’s installation cost. We, the founders,  are also investing approximately $100,000 of our own personal money in this project.

Sweden obviously doesn’t have as high solar irradiation as countries closer to the equator but being close to the equator also means higher temperatures. As the temperature rises the efficiency of the solar panel decreases dramatically.

 

The air temperature in the region of Project One is between -25°C (-13°F) and +31°C (87°F), the annual average air temperature is +7,8°C (44,6°F). The annual solar irradiation is approximately 1 100-1 200 kWh/m2 and the yearly electricity generated by 1 kW peak system with 0,75 performance ration and optimally inclined modules is approximatley 900 kWh/kW.

 

What You Get

By donating funds to NSP Project One you can be absolutely sure that the money will go to developing the solar park. We are not taking any salary and 100 % of future revenue, minus operating costs, will go to expanding the park.

As a proof and a thank you for being a part of this you will get a stainless steel plaque engraved with how much you donated, how many kWh solar power your donation will produce and how much CO2 you will save the world from.

Your name will also be engraved on a big brass sign on the Project One site entrance and be listed in the “Hall of Heroes” on our website.

 

By donating you will be

  • a part of accelerating the transition to sustainable energy
  • saving the world from tons and tons of CO2 emissions
  • showing the world that if we, the citizens of the world, come together we really CAN make a difference
  • saving the future generations from a world of total destruction and all the horrific consequences of that 

 

Why Should I Donate?

Why should I, who doesn’t live in Sweden or even in Europe, be interested in being a part of this you may think. Global warming is exactly that, global. We all share the same atmosphere and the emissions and rising temperatures affect us all. The colder climate in Sweden also keeps the efficiency of the solar panels on a high level, it drops significantly when the panels gets hot. Hence the deserts for example aren’t as good as you may think for solar parks.

 

Funding

We have chosen flexible funding and €1000 as the funding goal. We need a lot more than €1000 but the flexible funding allows us the get all the raised funds even if the goal isn't met. Sinces we have other potential channels for funding, we may be able to fund the solar park even if this campaign won't fund the whole project. Every Euro/Dollar/SEK raised is a small step closer to making Project One a reality. 

 

Climate Compensate Your Life

Want to climate compensate parts of your life or be CO2 neutral? 

Go to the Carbon Footprint Calculator to calculate your emissions!  

 

 

Will you be able to hand over the planet to your kids and grandkids, knowing we really had the chance to make it right before it was too late, but we chose not to care? 
Change is coming whether we like it or not. Help us stop this madness before its’s too late!

story:
Almost 70 years ago Prof John Roy Robert Searl (Prof Searl) invented a new process for generating energy using a device about the size of a small coffee table.  It requires no gas, coal or oil and radiates no heat.  It's called the Spatial Effect Generator (SEG), or by its original name the Searl Effect Generator.

Q: If it was invented so long ago why is it not everywhere already?

A: For approximately 55 years Prof Searl struggled on his own to understand and explain the SEG.  He faced many critics with opposing views because he could not describe exactly how it worked on an atomic level.  And investors are notorious for hanging onto their money when inventions are not fully understood.  Fortunately, time and scientific understanding have marched on, and with the help of a lot of brilliant people, we have a much deeper understanding of the process now.

SEG Magnetics, Inc. (SMI) and its members are forging ahead but we are at a critical stage in our magnetization process. We have designed and partially constructed the high-powered systems needed to magnetize the larger magnetic components.  Unfortunately, this stage of the research is very expensive and time-consuming.  But when complete it will allow us to replicate the SEG for the first time since it was originally conceived back in the 1950s.

Q:  What could this technology do for the world?

A:  It hardly needs to be described but have you ever run out of gas or experienced a power outage before?  As distressing and inconvenient as these situations may be they pale in comparison to the issues impoverished, third world, war-torn or far northern regions of our world face every day.

Remember what it was like the day after the Indian Ocean tsunami in 2004 or the 2011 tsunami in Japan?  Could more lives have been saved if every water source, hospital, civil service and heavy lift vehicle ran on a SEG?

Right now (July 2017) there are 22.5 million refugees dispersed around the world and most are in camps with little or no power at all. Schools, hospitals, and countless other basic human services are simply not possible because of a lack of access to power.

I am sure you are thinking this should be easy to find investors for, but this project is special. In recent years extremely wealthy individuals and organizations have attempted to secure ownership of this technology for their own reasons. Some simply see it as a way to accumulate more wealth and would have no problem selling off their shares to the highest bidder.  Others want to see it locked away and forgotten because it will compete directly with their investments in other energy technologies. We think there is room for many different sources of energy in the world. Gas, coal, and oil have many other uses and are not going anywhere for a very long time.  But are you willing to risk leaving control of this device in their hands?

Professor John Roy Robert Searl

"Each conventional 3 stage unit can produce 15 kWh of power yet it requires no gas, coal or oil and it radiates no heat. You can run it deep underground or far out in space. Anywhere you can imagine so long as it's above absolute zero, it's the perfect machine."

Risks and challenges

Prof Searl made enormous personal sacrifices and faced many challenges over the years understanding, developing, protecting and educating the public about the SEG. He has worked as long and hard as he can with limited support and at great personal risk.

This technology can transform our world. Please help us by donating what you can now.

Special thanks to all of the amazing people that helped us reach this point. We simply would not be here without you. You guys are the best!

Regards,

John R. R. Searl 
Fernando D. Morris 
Jason Verbelli 
Vincent Hallberg

NOTE: We acknowledge that there are other aspects of the SEG technology which we have not addressed in this campaign. For now, we have chosen to focus on the problem that we think is the most important and that's providing the world with a source of clean, abundant energy.
