story:
Short Summary

Without clean, safe and useable water this world would not survive. This project is about saving eco systems and forecasting catastrophic outbreaks that threaten and even kill wildlife and humans. Introducing the Autonomous Geo Mapping Predictive Water Quality Vessel, the newest and most innovative answer to one of the worlds most grave up and coming world issues. Our watercraft will be able to go into any body of water and autonomously navigate itself through thousands of GPS coordinates and capture Nitrogen, Phosphorus,Potassium, and PH levels map out the data gathered from the body of water and then once enough data is collected overtime it will be able to predict outbreaks and imbalances in the water. 

We are a group of 5 engineers from Florida International University. Two of us are electrical engineers and three are computer engineers. Along with the help of our mentor that has over 30 years in the software and electronics industry we are confident and excited to bring our project to life. 

What We Need & What You Get

The money will strictly go to cost of components needed. Since the product will be operated in different bodies of water corrosion is a big possibility which is why we will need various components for trial runs. 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge right now is making sure seaweed and different trash in the water does not become an obstacle or damage our watercraft. To overcome this we are making sure our boats structure is optimally designed to diverge from these objects as well as a motor that is powerful enough for the worst case situations.

story:
Now Finally We have A Cool Planner Ever! 

Why? Because this one you have never been offered before!!

 

Buy One Evolution Planner Annual Set - you get Three thin and lightweight Evolution planners!

 

Each of three planners weights just 250 grams (= 0,5 lbs) 

and the thickness of each is less than 9 mm! 

Now you don't need to carry excess weight!

Each of three planners contain 200 pages for 4 months! And every four months your planner will change its cover type and color. If you want it, of course! Because Now We give you the opportunity to decide how your planner will look like! 

 

That is why Evolution Planner is Bright, Stylish and Really Individual! Because Only you can decide what color your new planner will be! And Only You choose a cover of your new planner! There are no restrictions! Exciting Real Choice of 12 colors and 3 types of covers!

 

Evolution Planner is Ultimate Eco-Friendly! Because It is made of Amazing Bamboo Paper! Nature is happy, No one tree was cut down! Bamboo isn't Tree, Bamboo is a giant Grass!

Bamboo Paper Saves Trees!

Did you know it can take 24 fully grown trees to make just one ton of paper, which is only 400 reams of A4 paper! Imagine how many trees are sacrificed every day to meet our paper needs worldwide. Now consider bamboo, a member of the grass family which can grow up to 10 times faster than wood. Due to its many environmental advantages over wood, bamboo paper is 100% Tree-Free & Eco-Friendly - Acid-Free & Carbon Neutral & Chlorine-Free!

1. Bamboo vs Deforestation! Bamboo is a superhero in the fight against deforestation!

Bamboo has an extremely low environmental impact compared with the harvesting destruction of soft wood forests which results in high impact to birds and animals, and causes extensive land scarring. When it is harvested, it will grow a new shoot from its extensive root system with no need for additional planting or cultivation. Depending on the species, bamboo can be harvested in one to five years. Hardwoods like oak take at least forty years to mature before they can be harvested. Almost 1 million acres of forests are lost each week worldwide to deforestation. Bamboo's versatility as a substitute for hardwoods offers a chance to drastically reduce that figure and protect the forests that we have left. And Yes! Bamboo are 100% Biodegradable.

2. Bamboo is Air's Bro!

Bamboo absorbs over 4 times the amount of carbon and releases 35% more oxygen into the atmosphere than an equivalent stand of hardwood trees.

3. Bamboo is Best Soil Protector!

Bamboo roots remain in place after harvesting where they prevent erosion and help retain nutrients for the next crop. 

4. Bamboo is Real 100% Natural!

No fertilizer, pesticides, or herbicides needed! Unlike most cash crops, bamboo requires no agricultural chemicals to thrive. Unlike cotton, which is one of the most intensely sprayed crops in the world and rapidly depletes the nutrients in the soil, bamboo sequesters nitrogen and cultivation does not add chemicals to the environment.

5. Unique Versatility! 

After harvesting, virtually every part of the plant is used to make a wide variety of products. Paper, flooring, furniture, charcoal, building materials, and much more can be made from bamboo. It can be used for clothing manufacturing as well. It can be fed to livestock instead of GMO corn. What's more, bamboo fibers are far stronger than wood fibers and much less likely to warp from changing atmospheric conditions. It can be made into a plastic, and since bamboo shoots are a nutritious food, bamboo is really the answer to global poverty.

6. Guiness' Book Growth Record!

The world record for the fastest growing plant belongs to certain species of the 45 genera of bamboo, which have been found to grow at up to 91 cm (35 in) per day (and which grow in U.K.)!

Bamboo - Yes!

Can Bamboo save the planet? While scientists tell us that the answer to this question remains to be seen, we say YES! This amazing plant and its surging popularity in a huge variety of products offers mankind a chance to enjoy many of the comforts of modern life without causing irreparable damage to our environment.

There is Another Great News! If you live in U.S.A., Australia, Canada, China, European Union, Hong Kong, India, Japan, Republic of Korea, Singapore then shipping to you will cost just $6! 

For your Evolution Planner you can choose one of three types of pages design!

1. Here we have collected the best secrets of the top masters of personal growth. All of them are the most important and useful. Briefly and effectively!

2. It's just a convenient notebook! :) 

3. There are lots of interesting, useful, awesome, really working and motivating things for us. We have invested in this pages type all our energy, all our knowledge, all our inventions that have helped and help us every single day! It turned out very "Wow!"

Daily Layout.

A - Here are your reliable daily helpers. They will provide You with support every single day.

B - Here are the most important things to do, key points of a new day

C - Fixed Schedule. For those affairs that need to be done in scheduled time.

D - Flexible Schedule. For those affairs that can be done at any time of a new day.

E - Summarize the results and reward yourself for resistance

Year Layout.

A - Here write your desired goals on year

Daily Layout.

Something important For Me - The most important thing for you at that moment (this day, this week, this month, this year, whole life)

How I Fall Asleep and How I Wake Up - Create your own inspirational mood from the first moments of awakening! Use any techniques for it. Create a relaxing bedroom full of soothing music and pleasant scents! Submerge into the dreams, drawing your vision.

My Best Assistant in Affairs - Create a universal question that will help you in solving the major issues!

My Powerful Phrase - Define for yourself a phrase that will help you in a any difficult situations!

My Free Time Minute - Create for yourself profitable actions, to occupy yourself with productive activities in short breaks!

My New Habit - "It takes 66 days of doing something before it becomes a habit" (c) Robin Sharma

C - Daily Priorities. Jot down your most important to-do’s for the day here

D - Flexible Schedule. For those affairs that can be done at any time of a new day.

E - Summarize the results of a day. Note that what to-do you did with great quality, what amazing happened that day, what benefits you get today and something else to work on in the future!

Weekly Layout.

A - You have free time! Decide right now how you will improve your life! Every week or every month choose purposes - what's new you want to learn, what you want to start doing in your life and what you want to improve in your life. and record all these things!

B - This is Weekly Schedule, Jot down your most important to-do’s for the day here.

C - "My Tomorrow is What I'm focusing today!". This page is very useful and very simple to use. You jot down What You want to Attract ("This Into My Life"), How you want to do it ("By Using This") instead of some bad habits or useless activities ("Instead This"). This will help to adjust your plans each week and reinforce your new habits.

D - Your Special Attention. Jot down how You will increase your personal value! Jot down where accumulated mental, energy and physical trash is in your life and how you get rid of it. On a separate sheet write what you spend your time for and think about how you can reduce waste (for example, You can learn foreign languages on the way to the office, etc.)

The Best Planning Assistant.

We prepared for you a super-hero assistant for realization of challenges, which in the beginning seem impracticable.

A - Break the main goal into tasks

B - Prioritize tasks in order of their implementation and determine the deadline for each position

C - Pay attention to minor details and possible risks and write them all separately

Follow us on:

                           

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Now Finally We have A Cool Planner Ever! 

Why? Because this one you have never been offered before!!


 


Buy One Evolution Planner Annual Set - you get Three thin and lightweight Evolution planners!

 


Each of three planners weights just 250 grams (= 0,5 lbs) 
and the thickness of each is less than 9 mm! 

Now you don't need to carry excess weight!
Each of three planners contain 200 pages for 4 months! And every four months your planner will change its cover type and color. If you want it, of course! Because Now We give you the opportunity to decide how your planner will look like! 


 


That is why Evolution Planner is Bright, Stylish and Really Individual! Because Only you can decide what color your new planner will be! And Only You choose a cover of your new planner! There are no restrictions! Exciting Real Choice of 12 colors and 3 types of covers!


 


Evolution Planner is Ultimate Eco-Friendly! Because It is made of Amazing Bamboo Paper! Nature is happy, No one tree was cut down! Bamboo isn't Tree, Bamboo is a giant Grass!

Bamboo Paper Saves Trees!
Did you know it can take 24 fully grown trees to make just one ton of paper, which is only 400 reams of A4 paper! Imagine how many trees are sacrificed every day to meet our paper needs worldwide. Now consider bamboo, a member of the grass family which can grow up to 10 times faster than wood. Due to its many environmental advantages over wood, bamboo paper is 100% Tree-Free & Eco-Friendly - Acid-Free & Carbon Neutral & Chlorine-Free!


1. Bamboo vs Deforestation! Bamboo is a superhero in the fight against deforestation!
Bamboo has an extremely low environmental impact compared with the harvesting destruction of soft wood forests which results in high impact to birds and animals, and causes extensive land scarring. When it is harvested, it will grow a new shoot from its extensive root system with no need for additional planting or cultivation. Depending on the species, bamboo can be harvested in one to five years. Hardwoods like oak take at least forty years to mature before they can be harvested. Almost 1 million acres of forests are lost each week worldwide to deforestation. Bamboo's versatility as a substitute for hardwoods offers a chance to drastically reduce that figure and protect the forests that we have left. And Yes! Bamboo are 100% Biodegradable.
2. Bamboo is Air's Bro!
Bamboo absorbs over 4 times the amount of carbon and releases 35% more oxygen into the atmosphere than an equivalent stand of hardwood trees.
3. Bamboo is Best Soil Protector!
Bamboo roots remain in place after harvesting where they prevent erosion and help retain nutrients for the next crop. 
4. Bamboo is Real 100% Natural!
No fertilizer, pesticides, or herbicides needed! Unlike most cash crops, bamboo requires no agricultural chemicals to thrive. Unlike cotton, which is one of the most intensely sprayed crops in the world and rapidly depletes the nutrients in the soil, bamboo sequesters nitrogen and cultivation does not add chemicals to the environment.
5. Unique Versatility! 
After harvesting, virtually every part of the plant is used to make a wide variety of products. Paper, flooring, furniture, charcoal, building materials, and much more can be made from bamboo. It can be used for clothing manufacturing as well. It can be fed to livestock instead of GMO corn. What's more, bamboo fibers are far stronger than wood fibers and much less likely to warp from changing atmospheric conditions. It can be made into a plastic, and since bamboo shoots are a nutritious food, bamboo is really the answer to global poverty.
6. Guiness' Book Growth Record!
The world record for the fastest growing plant belongs to certain species of the 45 genera of bamboo, which have been found to grow at up to 91 cm (35 in) per day (and which grow in U.K.)!
Bamboo - Yes!
Can Bamboo save the planet? While scientists tell us that the answer to this question remains to be seen, we say YES! This amazing plant and its surging popularity in a huge variety of products offers mankind a chance to enjoy many of the comforts of modern life without causing irreparable damage to our environment.



There is Another Great News! If you live in U.S.A., Australia, Canada, China, European Union, Hong Kong, India, Japan, Republic of Korea, Singapore then shipping to you will cost just $6! 


For your Evolution Planner you can choose one of three types of pages design!

2. It's just a convenient notebook! :)

story:
The Loopingtech DuoX 120W GaN Charger is as small as a credit card. It has a compact size but a powerful core, the maximum output power is 120W, and can charge two devices simultaneously. It is also compatible with most devices on the market.

 

 

The charger is powered by the 3rd Generation Semiconductor material - Gallium Nitride(GaN), which can minimize volume, improve power density, and provide higher voltage and a larger current. 

By utilizing dual Gallium Nitride (GaN) cores and dual transformers, the charger powers devices faster while causing no damage to the battery. It is more efficient, produces less heat, and weighs less than a traditional charger.  

 

 

With this large amount of output, the charger produces a much faster-charging speed. Within 30 minutes, this charger can charge a Samsung S20 Ultra up to 75%. It is 4x quicker than the iPhone 5W charger and charges an iPhone 11 Pro Max to 20% within 10 minutes and up to 60% within 30 minutes.

 

 

 

Having several accessories can take up a lot of space and can easily get tangled into a mess. Using an all-in-one charger takes up the least amount of space while providing the most efficiency. They are simpler to use and can power multiple devices simultaneously from a single power outlet when outlets are limited. 

 

 

 

Together with the glue filling technology, its heat dissipation capability is maximized.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It is compatible with a wide range of modern electronic devices. You can replace all of your conventional chargers with just one DuoX GaN 120W Charger.

 

 

Don't worry about if your laptop does NOT charge with USB-C, we have prepared some small USB-C adapters below. The USB-C adapters will be made available to backers as part of the final shipping confirmation survey.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Loopingtech is an electronic consumption brand focusing on producing the newest semiconductor materials, Gallium nitride. Loopingtech was founded in 2020 by a group of tech geeks who wanted to create the greatest GaN products. Most of us have working experience in Intel, DJI. 

 

We designed, developed, and manufactured the smallest 65W GaN charger in only 3 MONTHS, which makes us a competitive player in the GaN chargers market. Our next record-breaking product, a 120W GaN fast charger is finally here.

story:
Hi I’m David Farmer and thank you for taking the time to read about this project. I have been running my own companies for the last few years, all working towards funding and building these concentrated solar power plants. Now I finally have the time and backing to get these moving.

CSP (Concentrated Solar Power) plants are not new, they have been working successfully for over 15 years in many countries around the world but they still only make up a very tiny percentage of energy production.

Atlantis CSP will be expanding the capabilities of these plants;

  • Providing 24hr electricity day or night with advanced storage capabilities
  • Desalinating sea water to produce fresh usable water
  • Terraforming arid land around the plant in to agriculture or grazing land
  • Producing brine, salt, oxygen and hydrogen if needed

 

These solar plant designs have been tried and tested but need to be constructed on a larger scale to make them more cost effective, so they can then replace the fossil fuel plants generating our current energy supply.

 

 

Why Do We Need These Plants?

Only 5.5% of total energy production in the EU and US comes from clean energy (solar, hydroelectric, geothermal, wind, and tidal). 

These clean energy sources are usually grouped with ‘Renewable’ energy, which doesn’t run out, but still involves burning wood, biomass and waste to produce energy, so not truly clean energy. Above you can see that the US produced only 5.4% of it's total energy supply from clean energy sources.

A few countries are doing quite well, however the majority are not progressing very fast. By 2040 the EIA (US Energy Information Association) estimates that 77% of the world’s energy production will still come from fossil fuels.

In fact fossil fuel use will be expanding to keep up with energy demand instead of new clean sources taking over. This volume of use will produce a huge amount of pollution and greenhouse gases, year on year.

A recent study showed that polluted air currently causes 5.5 million deaths every year, so even without the climate change affects we are already seeing around the world, it is obvious that our energy production methods need to be cleaned up.

We asked a few people what they thought of their countries clean energy efforts: https://youtu.be/zKdRhGbv6z0  

 

So What Is The Plan?

Atlantis CSP is aiming to have 30 large CSP plants created or under construction by 2025. These will be in different sun-belt locations around the world; Spain, Mexico, Australia, the USA, there are many viable country options. Once these have been completed we are then hoping to triple this number by 2030.

To get this entire project started we have split our funding requirements in to three simple stages. Stage 1 is where we are asking the crowdfunding community and private investors to help with. This funding will cover the planning of the initial 5-10 most viable plant locations which will move us on to Stage 2.

 

 

To compare, recently constructed 50MW plants in the south of Spain have cost approximately €280million to complete. This is where we will be reducing the initial setup costs and making these plants more viable.

 

 

Partnership & Visiting Our Solar Plants

We hope that everyone will be keen to support this project simply to improve the world in which we live. Protecting our environment, the air we breathe and the future of our planet.

Of course we also want to reward and include everyone as our partners in this project. So for every donation over €30 we will be giving access to our Partners Program where you will be able to keep up to date with our work, learn more about the World's clean energy advancements and  more;

PARTNER PROGRAM

  • View progress on each of our CSP Plants, in every country
  • Updates on clean energy around the world; Solar, Hydro, Geothermal, Wind & Tidal
  • News on government policies and initiatives to promote change
  • Information on energy suppliers offering true clean energy supply options
  • Information on companies that are making an effort to improving our environment
  • Exchange ideas and information with other Partners
  • Plus other ways you may want to get involved in improving our world

 

VISITING A CSP PLANT

Then, for donations over €150, as well as access to our Partner Program, we will be inviting you to visit one of our CSP plants anywhere in the world, either whilst it is under construction or once it is completed.

 

Financing

Of course it would be amazing to have all of the funding for Stage 1 of this project from the crowdfunding community. This would not only show the huge public support for a change to our current energy production, but also would mean the project can start fully without any delays for lengthy grant or investment applications.

However we will also be pursuing other grant and silent investor funding, whether this is for Stage 1 or that funding can be passed along to Stage 2 or 3. So whatever percentage of investment we are provided for this project it will still move forward.

 

Making a  Difference

Atlantis Concentrated Solar Power Plants will provide a stable, viable and limitless energy production method that can replace the current outdated and harmful systems that exist. Every hour enough energy reaches the Earth from the Sun to power our whole world’s energy needs for an entire year. So there is plenty of energy to use.

Our main focus will be on solar energy production, however we do not need to generate 100% of our energy production from this one method alone, we will work in tandem with hydroelectric, wind power, geothermal, tidal and all types of truly clean energy production to ensure a stable supply of energy the world over.

The main hesitation with CSP plants has been the cost, as there has been no continuity of build or rapid production of this technology. So the individual cost of each plant remains high. However with the right planning and organisation and the latest innovations, Atlantis CSP will be able to construct multiple plants in a variety of locations. Sourcing or producing identical equipment for every plant, we will be aiming to reduce the costs for the initial plants by 30-40% of current costs. Then for future plant product we aim to reduce costs by 50-60% of their current level. This should encourage countries and other energy companies to invest in CSP. This will then make these concentrated solar power plants not only a cost effective option, but also a stable energy production option that will rapidly expand across the globe.

Hopefully you can help to fund these essential clean energy plants or please pass us on to your friends, colleagues and relatives so that people know that options do exist if they want to make a difference. We will also be happy to hear from people with any suggestions or if you wish to get involved in any other ways.

So please share us through social media, use the Indiegogo simple share options and let’s make solar energy our leading energy supply in the world!

 These solar plant designs have been tried and tested but need to be constructed on a larger scale to make them more cost effective, so they can then replace the fossil fuel plants generating our current energy supply.  Why Do We Need These Plants?Only 5.5% of total energy production in the EU and US comes from clean energy (solar, hydroelectric, geothermal, wind, and tidal). These clean energy sources are usually grouped with ‘Renewable’ energy, which doesn’t run out, but still involves burning wood, biomass and waste to produce energy, so not truly clean energy. Above you can see that the US produced only 5.4% of it's total energy supply from clean energy sources.A few countries are doing quite well, however the majority are not progressing very fast. By 2040 the EIA (US Energy Information Association) estimates that 77% of the world’s energy production will still come from fossil fuels.In fact fossil fuel use will be expanding to keep up with energy demand instead of new clean sources taking over. This volume of use will produce a huge amount of pollution and greenhouse gases, year on year.A recent study showed that polluted air currently causes 5.5 million deaths every year, so even without the climate change affects we are already seeing around the world, it is obvious that our energy production methods need to be cleaned up.We asked a few people what they thought of their countries clean energy efforts: https://youtu.be/zKdRhGbv6z0   So What Is The Plan?Atlantis CSP is aiming to have 30 large CSP plants created or under construction by 2025. These will be in different sun-belt locations around the world; Spain, Mexico, Australia, the USA, there are many viable country options. Once these have been completed we are then hoping to triple this number by 2030.To get this entire project started we have split our funding requirements in to three simple stages. Stage 1 is where we are asking the crowdfunding community and private investors to help with. This funding will cover the planning of the initial 5-10 most viable plant locations which will move us on to Stage 2.  To compare, recently constructed 50MW plants in the south of Spain have cost approximately €280million to complete. This is where we will be reducing the initial setup costs and making these plants more viable.  Partnership & Visiting Our Solar PlantsWe hope that everyone will be keen to support this project simply to improve the world in which we live. Protecting our environment, the air we breathe and the future of our planet.Of course we also want to reward and include everyone as our partners in this project. So for every donation over €30 we will be giving access to our Partners Program where you will be able to keep up to date with our work, learn more about the World's clean energy advancements and  more;PARTNER PROGRAM
View progress on each of our CSP Plants, in every country
Updates on clean energy around the world; Solar, Hydro, Geothermal, Wind & Tidal
News on government policies and initiatives to promote change
Information on energy suppliers offering true clean energy supply options
Information on companies that are making an effort to improving our environment
Exchange ideas and information with other Partners
Plus other ways you may want to get involved in improving our world
 VISITING A CSP PLANTThen, for donations over €150, as well as access to our Partner Program, we will be inviting you to visit one of our CSP plants anywhere in the world, either whilst it is under construction or once it is completed. FinancingOf course it would be amazing to have all of the funding for Stage 1 of this project from the crowdfunding community. This would not only show the huge public support for a change to our current energy production, but also would mean the project can start fully without any delays for lengthy grant or investment applications.However we will also be pursuing other grant and silent investor funding, whether this is for Stage 1 or that funding can be passed along to Stage 2 or 3. So whatever percentage of investment we are provided for this project it will still move forward. Making a  DifferenceAtlantis Concentrated Solar Power Plants will provide a stable, viable and limitless energy production method that can replace the current outdated and harmful systems that exist. Every hour enough energy reaches the Earth from the Sun to power our whole world’s energy needs for an entire year. So there is plenty of energy to use.Our main focus will be on solar energy production, however we do not need to generate 100% of our energy production from this one method alone, we will work in tandem with hydroelectric, wind power, geothermal, tidal and all types of truly clean energy production to ensure a stable supply of energy the world over.The main hesitation with CSP plants has been the cost, as there has been no continuity of build or rapid production of this technology. So the individual cost of each plant remains high. However with the right planning and organisation and the latest innovations, Atlantis CSP will be able to construct multiple plants in a variety of locations. Sourcing or producing identical equipment for every plant, we will be aiming to reduce the costs for the initial plants by 30-40% of current costs. Then for future plant product we aim to reduce costs by 50-60% of their current level. This should encourage countries and other energy companies to invest in CSP. This will then make these concentrated solar power plants not only a cost effective option, but also a stable energy production option that will rapidly expand across the globe.Hopefully you can help to fund these essential clean energy plants or please pass us on to your friends, colleagues and relatives so that people know that options do exist if they want to make a difference. We will also be happy to hear from people with any suggestions or if you wish to get involved in any other ways.So please share us through social media, use the Indiegogo simple share options and let’s make solar energy our leading energy supply in the world!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

story:
What is Energy Systems & What do We do?

Energy Systems is a Cameroonian Based Start-up doing in renewable energy solutions for rural areas in Cameroon.  We aim to assist local communities and businesses in their daily energy struggle. Cameroon in particular and Africa’s  Rural areas in general pain to be connected to the electrical grid due generally to their geographical positions or the lack of real policy to tackle that serious issue of energy. So our main target as a start-up is to fulfil that gap of service by providing clean, cheap and renewable energy solutions.  Our final prototype, the data related to our future market and customers are ready but we face a real obstacle which is raising funds for setting a small factory, buying solar cells, batteries and other accessories for our solar kits. Due to the fact, local financial institutions are reticent to the idea to invest in early-stage startups crowdfunding has presented itself as the ultimate solutions for us. In the time you are reading this,  more than one and half billion people worldwide lack electricity either because they cannot afford it or because they are in remote areas. Our main goal is to help reduce this number while making a profit for our company. This campaign is an occasion for us to get financial support and to start a real production.

Opportunities 

The impact of energy shortage in Africa is significant: the World Bank estimates that this chronic shortage of power reduces Africa’s economic growth by about two percentage points every year.  A lack of clean, safe and affordable light in off-grid homes negatively affects health, education and local business.

X
by VIDSqaure
 
 
 
 
 
 

With this backdrop, the continent is ripe for energy innovation. The annual cost of living off-grid is around $27 billion globally, money which is spent on kerosene, candles, battery torches and other stopgap technologies for lighting and mobile-phone charging.  Increasingly, initiatives to provide off-grid solar power are providing home solar solutions, which provide a better service at a more affordable cost. Our aim as a business is to exploit that huge market potential and also help make other's life better. 

We are committed to offering clean power at a price within our customers’ existing energy budget. They are able to pay for our product over time and choose the service level that best suits their household’s needs.

The Reason we need funds?

At this stage the only real obstacle we are facing is fund. We do not have sufficient cash to start our production. The main parts of our products are :

  1. Solar cells & accessories to make an entire solar panel
  2. Inverters  
  3. Charge Controllers
  4. Batteries
  5. Wiring &other Accessories.

Funds raised from this campaign will be used to buy those materials we need for our production.

Why Should You Support Us?

We've come a long way since our project was just an inspiration!  It's been an exciting journey, but also a tremendous amount of work for few people and occasional part-time volunteers. We're hiring a team to help us move into production.   We are blessed to have a multitude of potential customers, even before our products being ready.

If you love our concept but aren't able to contribute financially, no worries. There are so many other ways to help out. We appreciate those who tell us they talk about Energy Systems with people they meet. It helps us when people join in on our social media pages to "like", comment, share, tweet, and pin. We have to give a special shout-out to our wonderful Facebook fans who have formed a sort of grassroots movement to help spread the word and move us forward.

  • Our Action will impact thousands of people's health, economy and way of living

  • The Environmental aspect of our project. 

  • Your Perk :)

Short-Term Goals 

  • Reduction of 850 000 kg of CO2 every year. 
  • Improvement of thousands of people's health and expenses
  • Hundred of Training campaigns related to renewables energies & Climate Change.

Working On Our Prototypes 

Solar Cells Assembling

BackSheet Making

Final Steps!!!

 

Thank you so much for supporting our business. We're super excited to finally launch our Campaign. The last months have been a crazy roller coaster ride for us, where we busted our butts every day to get to this point. And we've only just begun!

The encouragement of so many people makes us feel that we're really on to something special here. We hope to make people all over the world have more access to this basic right which is electricity. Please join our journey and spread the word to make the world a better place.

Over the past 12 months, we have pored over tons of energy research and studies about solar energy off-grid solutions. From there, we set out to take this research and develop a product with a target to improve the lives of many. After much trial and error, we’ve arrived at a prototype that people really love. Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver electricity to people doorstep.

                                                                                                                                 Thank You For Your Pledge!

Our manufacturing partners are ready to go.
